title: Geisha Colombia Las Nubes (250Grams)
description: Colombia, Camilo Merizalde, Las Nubes, Valle de Cauca Geisha LIMITED parcels left on SALE PRICE!) Be one of the FORTUNATE FEW to try this romantic coffee, suitable as gifts & special occasions for your loved ones! Tip: It tastes sweeter as it cools! Don’t drink it hot! WHAT is GEISHA?: Click here to read more We recommend brewing it on the Clever cup for maximum fruitiness! Exclusive Single Origin: Colombia Las Nubes Valle de Cauca Geisha Variety: Geisha Elevation: 1,900-2,100m Processing: Natural Roast profile: Light/Medium Roast Flavour: Lychee, Strawberry, Blueberry, Tropical fruit, Floral and Lemons Acidity: Medium High Body: Medium, Smooth Farm Information Dedicated owner of this farm is Camilo Merizalde whereby he takes pride and delicate measures to ensure his Central American geishas provide a full tropical and tea-like experience. His farm is located in the Santiago de Cali, Valle de Cauca region and we feel so far that this is the best Geisha outside Panama that provides the

title: Belgian Mocha
description: Special Origin Blend: Brazillian Santos, Colombian Bordones Salto, Indonesian Aged Mandheling Variety: Bourbon, Catimor Elevation: 400m - 1,700m Processing: Fully washed, Natural and infused with Dark Belgian Bittersweet Cacoa essential oils and Cocoa butter. Roast profile: Medium Dark Roast Flavour: Belgian Chocolate, Ferrero Rocher, Dark Bittersweet chocolate and Hazelnuts. Acidity: Low Body: Medium High, syrupy Tasting Experience As a Pour over, chocolatey aroma is profound, one is definitely reminded of the sweet memory of sipping down a sinfully deep dark hot chocolate on a winter morning during the holidays. Nuancing with bittersweet belgian chocolate notes and hazelnut scents. This is the compulsory to-go coffee for mocha and dark chocolate lovers. As an Espresso, one memory is brought to mind. Ferrero Rocher. The hazelnut nuances is distinguished as a high middle note in the flavour profile whereas the big dark chocolate notes punches firmly as the first and final flavour perce

title: Congo Kivu
description: Region: Congo, North Kivu, South Kivu ,Ituri Variety: Bourbon, Jackson Bourbon Elevation: 1,500m - 2,000m Processing: Natural Roast profile: Medium Dark Roast now! (Not a medium roast as stated on the label) Flavour notes: BlackForest Cake, Berries, Raisins, Chocolate, Citrusy, Plums Acidity: Sweet Body: Full Tasting Experience As a Pour over, fancy dark fruits and BlackForest cakes? You're ina for a treat then! Blackberry & Blueberry aroma are the first notes you will be hit by followed alog with sweet raisins & juicy plums. As an Espresso, this shot is really something. The rich overlay of chocolate and citrus smokes off the fruity chocolatey crema as the whole experience reminds you of a jolly good Malty Orange Chocolate Bar. Farm Information Coffee production has been, like every facet of life in the Democratic Republic of Congo, subject to the forces of decades of civil conflict. Lacking both infrastructure (roads, vehicles, clean water, reliable electricity) and security for priv

description: Region: Congo, North Kivu, South Kivu ,Ituri Variety: Bourbon, Jackson Bourbon Elevation: 1,500m - 2,000m Processing: Natural Roast profile: Medium Dark Roast now! (Not a medium roast as stated on the label) Flavour notes: BlackForest Cake, Berries, Raisins, Chocolate, Citrusy, Plums Acidity: Sweet Body: Full Tasting Experience As a Pour over, fancy dark fruits and BlackForest cakes? You're ina for a treat then! Blackberry & Blueberry aroma are the first notes you will be hit by followed alog with sweet raisins & juicy plums. As an Espresso, this shot is really something. The rich overlay of chocolate and citrus smokes off the fruity chocolatey crema as the whole experience reminds you of a jolly good Malty Orange Chocolate Bar. Farm Information Coffee production has been, like every facet of life in the Democratic Republic of Congo, subject to the forces of decades of civil conflict. title: Colombia El Salto Bordones
description: Region: Colombia De Salto Bordones, Tolima / El Libano Variety: Castillo, Caturra Elevation: 1,800 - 2,100m Processing: Sun Natural & Washed Roast profile: Medium Roast Flavour notes: Fruity, Nutty, Citrusy, Caramel, Candy & Cocoa. Acidity: Medium Body: Creamy subtle Tasting Experience As a Pour over, a fruity cinnamon bun spilled over with cocoa butter comes to mind. A great deal of caramel can be tasted along a prominent citrusy vibe. As an Espresso, my my. Just like a fully Organic Nut Butter. Bring on the nut fest! Strong hazelnut notes paired along with a chocolatey smothered candied fruit aroma? What can make your body rock more? This is perfect for the nutty and citrusy coffee drinkers out there. Farm Information El Libano is located at the north of the State of Tolima. Coffee is the main economic activity of the municipality, and the small farmers depends on this activity, the average Hectare of this zone per farm is less than 5 Ha. title: Ethiopian Apex Trio
description: Cowpresso #2 selling coffee since 2017 Region: Yirgacheffe, Kochere & Guji Variety: Heirlooms Elevation: 1,750m - 2,200m Processing: Natural, Sun Dried Roast profile: Medium to Medium Dark Roast (For maximum sweetness) Flavour notes: Strawberry, Floral, Juicy Plums, Citrus, Lychee, Candy Oranges Acidity: Crisp Body: Silky Tasting experience As a Pour over, Strawberry & Lychee aromas are arresting. Imagine drinking a top-notch Pu-Erh tea balanced across with the acidity of citrius and sweetness of a plum. Don't be surprised if you feel as if you have been drinking coffee in the Bahamas because the floral notes in this Ethiopian Blend is not one to be missed for you floral fruity lovers out there. Being a clean, silky smooth pour is no longer just plain joe. As an Espresso, floral notes are turn low towards a fruity tea nuance. Sweet berries is the outstanding flavour here apart from its delicate Citrus flavour reminisce of Candied Oranges. Farm Information Exporter and producer Abdullah

description: Region: Colombia De Salto Bordones, Tolima / El Libano Variety: Castillo, Caturra Elevation: 1,800 - 2,100m Processing: Sun Natural & Washed Roast profile: Medium Roast Flavour notes: Fruity, Nutty, Citrusy, Caramel, Candy & Cocoa. Acidity: Medium Body: Creamy subtle Tasting Experience As a Pour over, a fruity cinnamon bun spilled over with cocoa butter comes to mind. A great deal of caramel can be tasted along a prominent citrusy vibe. As an Espresso, my my. Just like a fully Organic Nut Butter. Bring on the nut fest! Strong hazelnut notes paired along with a chocolatey smothered candied fruit aroma? What can make your body rock more? This is perfect for the nutty and citrusy coffee drinkers out there. Farm Information El Libano is located at the north of the State of Tolima. Coffee is the main economic activity of the municipality, and the small farmers depends on this activity, the average Hectare of this zone per farm is less than 5 Ha. title: Nanyang Kopi Roast
description: Special Origin Blend: Seasonal Indonesia Mandheling and Seasonal Brazil Variety: Typica, Bourbon, Catimor Elevation: 400m - 1,800m Processing: Fully washed and Natural. Roast profile: Dark Roast Flavour: Buttery, Rich, Robust caramelised bread, Toasted marshmallows, Hint of chocolate and nuttiness, Acidity: Mild Body: Full, syrupy Tasting Experience As a Pour over, roasty aroma is imminent, one is definitely in for a rich sumptious mouthfeel and gulp of toasted marshmallows. The buttery notes pairs it's way well with the light hint of macademia nuts and complimentary mild acidity. Compulsory to-go coffee for traditional kopi-lovers who want their usual coffee more complex and sweeter in nuances with no sugar/margarine/maize added. As an Espresso, the crema is one to be boasted of. A smooth dark rich crema paired with it's complex roasty and buttery notes works well for a canvas for latte art and a good start for the hustling day ahead. Full, syrupy body is one to be reckoned for heavy

title: Rich Stout Blend
description: Based on feedback we have tweaked the blend composition for September 2020 from previous roasts. Exclusive Origin Blend: Brazil Santos, Colombian Specialty Supremo, Indonesian Aged Mandheling Variety: Bourbon & Catimor Elevation: 400m-2,000m Processing: Fully washed and Natural Roast profile: Medium Dark Roast Flavour: Pistachio nuttiness, Caramel, Brown Sugar, Buttery, Creamy Acidity: Low Body: High, syrupy Tasting Experience As a Pour over, caramel notes are shown, giving a nuanced smooth brown sugar aftertaste. Similar to a late night evening, the richness and creaminess of blend boasts itself a lingering buttery mouthfeel similar to a loyal ol dark stout- smooth, rich and intense. As an Espresso, the buttery nuances is dignified. Whiffs of Pistachio aromas from the rich golden brown crema with a hint of fruitiness, reminiscent of a cross between a blueberry and gooseberry. A sense of drinking down a stout can be felt as the syrupy mouthfeel complements the wholeness of the blend. T

title: Organic DECAF Colombia Maragogipe
description: Region: Colombia, Maragogipe Variety: Typica, Caturra Elevation: 1,200 - 2,000m Processing: S.Water Roast profile: Medium Dark (Back to the original roast and farmer!) Flavour notes: Vanilla Wafers, Milk Chocolate, Malt & Rich Brownies Acidity: Low Body: Medium and Smooth Tasting Experience As a Pour over, Vanilla & Chocolate is aromatic and pleasant as soon as the bloom erupts, A subtle hint of creaminess can be nuanced at the back of the palate which serves well towards providing the cup balanced body . When brewed with cleaner brewing methods such as the Chemex, the Milk chocolate notes has a lingering finish. A warming sensation of Malt breaks through as the finishing notes, perfect cup for the dinner session and cup before bed! As an Espresso, Superbly delicious. One is able to down as many shots as possible without feeling the effects of Caffeine. Vanilla wafer flavours and a Malt brownie sweet finish is uplifted as the main flavour nuances detected in an Espresso. Farm Informati

Region: Uganda Bugisu Variety: SL 14 , SL 28 Elevation: 1,400 - 2,200m Processing: Fully Washed Roast profile: Medium Roast Flavour notes: Green Grapes. Sweet Oranges. Plums. Black Tea. Wine. Dried Figs. Acidity: Winey Body: Smooth Tasting experience As an Espresso, this shot is outstandingly similar to a Port wine. The aromas of orange zest and sweet grapes perfumes off its crema as a subtle warming smell and hint of woodsiness seals the overall flavour perception and experience like a warm body. Sweet grapes, Citrus, Woodsy and Memorable. Great as a winey finish. As it cools, the flavour mellows out to chocolate and a pronounced taste of Figs. Farm Information Area on the slopes of Mt Elgon in the Bugisu sub-region in Eastern Uganda. Enriched in the soils of high altitude & rich rainfall, this lot is spoilt for resources and room for growth. Resourcefulness & quality of the plant is now up to the farmer's decision to process it through natur
grind_size: Other grind size (Please state in notes at Cart page)

title: Rich Stout Blend
description: Based on feedback we have tweaked the blend composition for September 2020 from previous roasts. Exclusive Origin Blend: Brazil Santos, Colombian Specialty Supremo, Indonesian Aged Mandheling Variety: Bourbon & Catimor Elevation: 400m-2,000m Processing: Fully washed and Natural Roast profile: Medium Dark Roast Flavour: Pistachio nuttiness, Caramel, Brown Sugar, Buttery, Creamy Acidity: Low Body: High, syrupy Tasting Experience As a Pour over, caramel notes are shown, giving a nuanced smooth brown sugar aftertaste. Similar to a late night evening, the richness and creaminess of blend boasts itself a lingering buttery mouthfeel similar to a loyal ol dark stout- smooth, rich and intense. As an Espresso, the buttery nuances is dignified. Whiffs of Pistachio aromas from the rich golden brown crema with a hint of fruitiness, reminiscent of a cross between a blueberry and gooseberry. A sense of drinking down a stout can be felt as the syrupy mouthfeel complements the wholeness of the blend. T
weight: 40 Drip Bags (Select drip bags as grind size, there is availability)

title: Organic DECAF Colombia Maragogipe
description: Region: Colombia, Maragogipe Variety: Typica, Caturra Elevation: 1,200 - 2,000m Processing: S.Water Roast profile: Medium Dark (Back to the original roast and farmer!) Flavour notes: Vanilla Wafers, Milk Chocolate, Malt & Rich Brownies Acidity: Low Body: Medium and Smooth Tasting Experience As a Pour over, Vanilla & Chocolate is aromatic and pleasant as soon as the bloom erupts, A subtle hint of creaminess can be nuanced at the back of the palate which serves well towards providing the cup balanced body . When brewed with cleaner brewing methods such as the Chemex, the Milk chocolate notes has a lingering finish. A warming sensation of Malt breaks through as the finishing notes, perfect cup for the dinner session and cup before bed! As an Espresso, Superbly delicious. One is able to down as many shots as possible without feeling the effects of Caffeine. Vanilla wafer flavours and a Malt brownie sweet finish is uplifted as the main flavour nuances detected in an Espresso. Farm Informati

description: Revolutionize and change your coffee brewings and experience Quality & Cowpresso built. High Value-priced compared to the Hario Drip Scale and Acaia. Coffee brewing should not be exclusive and expensive but open for everyone to indulge in. Engraved with Cowpresso logo for quality-assurance. Free Singapore Delivery. The secret to the technique and art of brewing the perfect cup of coffee is consistency and detail. There's never too much detail and skill you can put into Specialty Coffee. Only when you truly measure a consistent brewing recipe and utilise your honed barista techniques can you truly enjoy the perfect liquid gold cup of coffee daily. The Coffee Scale engraved with our Cowpresso logo ensures you top-notch quality with our name on the line. The scale is designed and built for coffee brewers, enthusiasts, baristas, bakers and even the professionals that scrutinize a coffee recipe; weight (Grammage 0.1gram-3000grams) and time (Time 1sec-9999secs) as the coffee brews. title: Refillable Nespresso Capsules
description: **Please take note that this fits the ORIGINAL NESPRESSO MACHINES, NOT VERTUO** Reusable/Refillable Nespresso Capsules Cowpresso manufactured reusable capsule for Nespresso systems that is environmentally friendly, saves you money and allows you to enjoy better coffee. Designed with a high quality PP, thicker core and harder capsule walls to extend life-time usage. Stop killing the earth with disposable pods. Save up to $1000 on coffee per year for a six-person family. The Best Part? This allows you to use any kind of coffee from your Local Specialty Coffee Roaster. If you are purchasing with our coffee, select"other grind size" for the coffee parcels and let us know in the notes section which parcel for"espresso grind for nespresso capsules". Just fill the grinds to the brim, close, and pop it into your machine. Larger grind sizes will let the water flow through too quickly. Best if used with your own grinder so you can calibrate the grind sizes according to your tastes and roast leve

title: Digital Infrared Contactless Thermometer
description: Free Premium Shipping (Next Day Delivery, please check shipping dates) Perfect for regulating your Hot Air Popper temperature. Hot Air Poppers are the fun and easy way to get started roasting coffee with little investment. The Infrared thermometer we hold utilizes the latest infrared pyrometers, visual IR thermometers, and contact thermometers. This offers wide expertise for a complete range of temperature applications for baking and home use. Why bother with a long probe when the temperature is easily indicated & quickly recorded in a digitalized form instantly with the infrared thermometer. Display Size: 2.0 - 3.9 Inches Display Type: Digital Style: Handheld Power Type: AAA Battery Temperature range: -50 ~ 330℃ (-58~626℉) Accuracy: ±1.5% or ±1.5℃ Emissivity: 0.95 (fixed) Red Laser Power: less than 0.5 MW Power supply: 2 x AAA battery (the batteries are not included) Product Dimension: 140 x 85 x 35mm(L*W*H)

title: Brazil Santos
description: Region: Santos, Sao Paulo Producer: Grabriel De Carvalho Dias Variety: Mundo Novo, Catuai, Tupi, Bourbon Elevation: 800m - 1,200m Processing: Natural/Dry Roast profile: Medium to Med. Dark Roast Flavour notes: Chocolatey, Buttery, Dark cocoa, Hazelnuts & Lindt chocolate Acidity: Mild Body: Medium & Smooth Tasting Experience As a Pour over, buttery notes can be scented immediately. Just like a nut flavoured essential oil, this brazil as a pour will bring about a delicate smooth joe perfumed with light hints of hazelnut. As an Espresso, the brazillian is brought to its fullest potential. Chocolatey. Buttery. Nutty. Yes this is the ideal way to brew the brazillian. Reminisce of a bouquet of nutella and lindt chocolate. A deep sense of endorphins will run through your blood as the deep complex chocolatey notes will bring about memories of drinking hot chocolate on a Sunday Morning. Farm Information Fazenda Cachoeira da Grama has been in the Carvalho Dias family since 1890. Gabriel de Carva

Bigger value brewing kits: Enthusiast Brewing Kit & Connoisseur Brewing Kit Includes 1)Cowpresso Hand Burr Grinder 2)Cowpresso's Surprise 250Gm Freshly Roasted Roasted Coffee Parcel (Random parcel from our $15-22 Coffee selection) 3)Coffee Sock Filter 4)FREE Nationwide delivery Cowpresso Burr Grinder Detailed post on the Cowpresso Hand Coffee Burr Grinder: Click here Cowpresso ceramic burr coffee grinders produces a more consistent grind size than other poorly generic made burr and blade grinders in the market comprised of cheap ceramic and steel burrs and blades. The burrs are made of a harder quality ceramic, forming a sharper and more durable ridges. This crushes the beans into consistent grind sizes without losing its sharpness and durability for a long time. You might ask then? Why not a blade grinder? A blade grinder randomly slices beans as the blade spins anyhow anywhere, forming inconsistent grind sizes and bitter ran

title: Brazil Santos
description: Region: Santos, Sao Paulo Producer: Grabriel De Carvalho Dias Variety: Mundo Novo, Catuai, Tupi, Bourbon Elevation: 800m - 1,200m Processing: Natural/Dry Roast profile: Medium to Med. Dark Roast Flavour notes: Chocolatey, Buttery, Dark cocoa, Hazelnuts & Lindt chocolate Acidity: Mild Body: Medium & Smooth Tasting Experience As a Pour over, buttery notes can be scented immediately. Just like a nut flavoured essential oil, this brazil as a pour will bring about a delicate smooth joe perfumed with light hints of hazelnut. As an Espresso, the brazillian is brought to its fullest potential. Chocolatey. Buttery. Nutty. Yes this is the ideal way to brew the brazillian. Reminisce of a bouquet of nutella and lindt chocolate. A deep sense of endorphins will run through your blood as the deep complex chocolatey notes will bring about memories of drinking hot chocolate on a Sunday Morning. Farm Information Fazenda Cachoeira da Grama has been in the Carvalho Dias family since 1890. Gabriel de Carva

title: Gene Cafe Roaster (Discontinued)
description: Free Singapore Delivery. Warranty for 6 months. Drop us a WHATSAPP MESSAGE at +65 8550 8143 for all machine-related questions and to make a payment via Bank Transfer. A machine specialist will get back to you as soon as they can. SOLD OUT NETT pricing no additional tax or hidden cost. International Shipping and local tax rules apply for international orders. Gene Café CBR-101 is designed for a household roaster, however lots of Café Owners use it for the Café and Restaurant. It incorporates state-of-the-art design, the highest quality materials and expert workmanship. Genesis Technology simplifies and automates the coffee roasting process. Before using the Gene Café, you will be entitled to a FREE Roasting and Introduction Class to learn how to use and maintain your roaster (Regular retail price purchase). Gene Cafe Demonstration Specifications + Name : CBR-101 + Mixing type : twisting (Off-axis rotation) + Cooling : Heater Off(Manual/Automatic) on Roast end + Heating : Indirect hot ai

title: Indonesian Aged Mandheling
description: Cowpresso TOP 3 selling coffee since 2017 Region: Angkola, Siripok. North Sumatra Indonesia Variety: Catimor, Typica Elevation: 800m - 1,700m Processing: Pulped Natural/Wet Hulled Roast profile: Medium Dark Roast Flavour notes: Cedar, Soft Tobacco, Black Tea, Lingering Spice and Toasted Bread Acidity: Low Body: High, syrupy Tasting Experience As a pour-over, cedar notes are exemplified, giving special nuances of soft tobacco. The light woody smokiness of the Indonesian Aged Mandheling boasts itself prominently with spice battered toasted bread flavour notes overlaying the bold flavour notes. As an Espresso, the creaminess of the cup is the real star. Toasty aromas of cedar and tobacco, reminisce about a good old campfire with your best buds around. A unique fermentation scent can be identified as nuanced black tea. Farm Information According to the farm's story and area history, coffee first entered Sumatra Island in the Dutch Colonial era in 1830-1870 from Yemen and Malabar. Farms wer

This model enables to deliver 8 cups of espresso continuously. title: Indonesian Aged Mandheling

A unique fermentation scent can be identified as nuanced black tea. title: Colombia Supremo 1KG (Green/Unroasted Coffee)
description: Please note this is Green Unroasted Coffee beans, not Roasted Coffee. Contact us for Wholesale rates, we are keen on aiding the Home Roaster's/Small Roasting Business Community! We hold more than 30 other Single Origin/Blends Green Coffee Beans in our Roasting lab as well, let us know if you are keen. Region: Colombia De Salto Bordones Variety: Caturra Elevation: 1,800 - 2,000m Processing: Washed Recommended Roast profile: Medium Roast Flavour: Fruity, Nutty, Citrusy, Caramel, Candy & Cocoa. Acidity: Medium Body: High, syrupy As a Pour over, a fruity cinnamon bun spilled over with cocoa butter comes to mind. A great deal of caramel can be tasted along a prominent citrusy vibe. As an Espresso, my my. Just like a fully Organic Nut Butter. Bring on the nut fest! Strong hazelnut notes paired along with a chocolatey smothered candied fruit aroma? What can make your body rock more? This is perfect for the nutty and citrusy coffee drinkers out there.

title: Single Origin Green Coffee Beans
description: Drop us an email with your contact details to enquire on our green coffees for your home roasting or business. Have an origin you have been dying to try and don't see it available? Let us know and we might bring it in for future green bean rotations :) Please note that we require purchases of 10kg of each origin. For smaller batches of 1kg of green beans, please purchase from our available listings :)

title: Biweekly Surprise Plan (3 Months)
description: This Package delivers One 250Gram Surprise Coffee Parcel per fortnight for 3 Months (Total 6 Parcels) Surprise Coffees includes $15-25 Coffees from our Current offerings . You pay only $17/Parcel nevertheless & FREE Singapore Shipping is on us! (Read shipping terms) Choose your Grind size: Wholebeans, Pourover (Medium grind), Cold Brew (Coarse grind), or 10 Drip Bags. Write your brewing method in notes at cart page if you cannot find your grind size (Espresso Grind (also for our Nespresso Capsules), Moka Grind, Aeropress Grind, French Press Grind). We highly recommend getting your own grinder as the whole beans stay fresher and you can grind on demand. Purchase option available for multiple cycles and months. Note for international orders, total number of parcels in the chosen subscription will be sent in one delivery. Not valid with any discount codes Gentle note, since the surprise plan is heavily discounted for your benefit: the system cannot be modified to change/pause/delay delive

title: Lelit Grace PL81T Espresso Machine (DISCONTINUED)
description: FREE Singapore doorstep delivery from Italy, 6 Months Warranty To pay through bank transfer/paynow for local and all international orders, email hello@cowpressocoffee.sg. Drop us a WHATSAPP MESSAGE at +65 8550 8143 for all your machine-related questions. Machine Bank Transfer Price: 1249 Machine Credit Card: 1310 (CC has a 4% surcharge) Shipping Fees: Shipping and local tax rules apply for international orders. Grace - PL81T DESIGN, TECHNOLOGY AND PROFESSIONAL COMPONENTS WORTHY OF A QUEEN Grace is the family of espresso machines where we concentrated the best of technology and design. Harmonious lines, innate elegance and accurate choice of materials and finishing make this Lelit line a piece of furniture and a superb espresso machine. Our LCC (electronic control system) that rules the parameters for brewing a coffee is a treat: this line is a must for those who expect an exceptional Espresso with a world class visual effect. Wide cup warmer. Back lit, round switches in stainless steel

Cowpresso Burr Grinder Detailed post on the Cowpresso Hand Coffee Burr Grinder: Click here Cowpresso ceramic burr coffee grinders produces a more consistent grind size than other poorly generic made burr and blade grinders in the market comprised of cheap ceramic and steel burrs and blades. The burrs are made of a harder quality ceramic, forming a sharper and more durable ridges. This crushes the beans into consistent grind sizes without losing its sharpness and durability for a long time. You might ask then? Why not a blade grinder? A blade grinder randomly slices beans as the blade spins anyhow anywher

title: Gold Precision Coffee Distributor
description: Master the control of even tamping and you'll be brewing consistent cups of delicious coffee everyday! By distributing espresso grounds into a perfect even layer before tamping, extraction will be consistent and this will affect quality and balance of sweetness, acidic and bitter nuances. With the Gold Precision Coffee Distributor, you'll be brewing evenly extracted espresso every pull! Say goodbye to inconsistent barista's distribution skills! The Gold Precision Coffee Distributor is fit for any 58mm portafilters and baskets. It is made of 100% Stainless Steel. Ergonomic and Heavyweight. How does it work? 1) Creates a perfect flat surface of espresso grounds before tamping. This causes the pressed coffee to be more consistent in terms of density as it is evenly distributed. This avoids uneven extraction whereby the barista's fingers are used instead to distribute the coffee out evenly when this tool is not available. 2) Consists of 3 precision slopes engraved into the Polished Stainle

title: Premium Coffee Sock Brewer
description: Premium Cotton Coffee Sock Filter Perfect brewing device to go. Lightweight and essentially takes up little or no space. Rinse and squeeze dry for a quick clean routine with no extra hassle compared to other brewing devices. Being a real local brewing device in coffeeshops, one will definitely be pleased especially with the culture and experience of brewing through the coffee sock. Clean, smooth flavours are extracted specifically without losing out in it's rich body with additional pours. Material does not fray or result in stray strands like other coffee brewers, and we've been using ours for years. When stiff, just soak in water to soften and it will work as new. We recommend passing your brewing water/coffee through your favourite coffee grounds and sock 1-3 Times to extract the best flavours. Why not experiment and use it as a full immersion brewing device as well? Pour your perfect temperature brewing water into the grounds in your coffee sock and let it sit before passing throug

title: Organic DECAF Colombia Maragogipe 1KG (Green/Unroasted Coffee)
description: Elevation: 1,200 - 2,000m Processing: S.Water Recommended Roast profile: Full Medium Roast Flavour notes: Vanilla Wafers, Milk Chocolate, Malt & Rich Brownies Acidity: Low Body: Medium and Smooth Roasting suggestion with the Kaffelogic Home Roaster : Play around with Classic Profile Medium to Dark past 2nd crack Tasting Experience As a Pour over, Vanilla & Chocolate is aromatic and pleasant as soon as the bloom erupts, A subtle hint of creaminess can be nuanced at the back of the palate which serves well towards providing the cup balanced body . When brewed with cleaner brewing methods such as the Chemex, the Milk chocolate notes has a lingering finish. A warming sensation of Malt breaks through as the finishing notes, perfect cup for the dinner session and cup before bed! As an Espresso, Superbly delicious. One is able to down as many shots as possible without feeling the effects of Caffeine. Vanilla wafer flavours and a Malt brownie sweet finish is uplifted as the main flavour nuance

title: Unbleached Coffee Filters (100 Pieces)
description: FREE Singapore Shipping to Mailbox. Orders over $50 come with FREE Singapore Courier Shipping with a tracking code. Unbleached Coffee Filters (100 Pieces) Safe & Convenient to use Filters to brew your favourite freshly grounded cup of beans. Micro-sized pores are consistent to provide even flow of water for your consistent cups of delicious coffees! Does not hone or influence a Bleached Papery flavour. Natural filters is the best way to brew for the most natural cup of coffee without any funky flavours from bleach or other chemicals. Features 1) Unbleached, non-toxic and odourless 2) Size: Suitable up to 4 Cups 3) Resistant to Heat up to 200 Celsius 4) High quality even sized micro pores to provide consistent flow of coffee throughout the filter without causing channeling and extraction problems 5) Filter is relatively tall to prevent grounds from overfilling and overflowing

title: 🎄Holiday Blend🎄
description: Special Origin Blend: Ethiopian & Ugandan Elevation: 1,200m - 2,200m ASL Processing: Natural & Washed Roast profile: Medium-Dark Roast Flavour: Blackberry, Maple Syrup, Hazelnut Toffee Acidity: Low-medium Body: Medium Tasting Experience As a pourover, this is the go-to coffee to revel your friends & family with at home! An excellent coffee for this festive season to gather and have a joyous celebration! As an Espresso, this blend is a feel-good with its orange, sparkling notes blending with roasty-sweet chocolate. Being crafted by several origins meant to bring out the festive Holiday of a chocolate yule cake. A versatile blend for handing out Americanos or Espresso-Milk based beverages! Packaging Premium White Matte Block Bottom Pouches with One-way valve & Easy-Tear Resealable Zipper. Heat Sealed for extended freshness.

title: Congo Kivu 1KG (Green/Unroasted Coffee)
description: Please note this is Green Unroasted Coffee beans, not Roasted Coffee. Contact us for Wholesale rates, we are keen on aiding the Home Roaster's/Small Roasting Business Community! We hold more than 30 other Single Origin/Blends Green Coffee Beans in our Roasting lab as well, let us know if you are keen. Region: Congo, North Kivu, South Kivu ,Ituri Variety: Bourbon, Jackson Bourbon Elevation: 1,500m - 2,000m Processing: Natural Recommended Roast profile: Medium Roast Flavour notes: BlackForest Cake, Berries, Raisins, Chocolate, Citrusy, Plums Acidity: Sweet Body: Full Tasting Experience As a Pour over, fancy dark fruits and BlackForest cakes? You're ina for a treat then! Blackberry & Blueberry aroma are the first notes you will be hit by followed alog with sweet raisins & juicy plums. As an Espresso, this shot is really something. The rich overlay of chocolate and citrus smokes off the fruity chocolatey crema as the whole experience reminds you of a jolly good Malty Orange Chocolate Bar.

title: Brazil Santos 1KG (Green/Unroasted Coffee)
description: Please note this is Green Unroasted Coffee beans, not Roasted Coffee. For international shipping, please contact first as you may not be able to import this into your country! Region: Santos Variety: Mundo Novo, Catuaí, Tupi Elevation: 500m-1350m Processing: Natural Recommended roast profile: Medium/City Roast Flavour: Chocolatey, buttery, dark cocoa and hazelnuts Acidity: Soft Body: Medium As a Pour over, buttery notes can be scented immediately. Just like a nut flavoured essential oil, this brazil as a pour will bring about a delicate smooth joe perfumed with light hints of hazelnut. As an Espresso, the brazillian is brought to its fullest potential. Chocolatey. Buttery. Nutty. Yes this is the ideal way to brew the brazillian. Reminisce of a bouquet of nutella and lindt chocolate. A deep sense of endorphins will run through your blood as the deep complex chocolatey notes will bring about memories of drinking hot chocolate on a Sunday Morning

title: Cowpresso French Press
description: This French Press is shipped by Premium Shipping $2.90 (Next day delivery after Roast Date) to avoid delays or possible damage by the handling of Free Shipping (Postage) to Mailbox. Note: Sale items are non-exchangeable. Why brew using the French Press? For maximum flavour extraction, maximum extraction of coffee essential oils and a sumptuous Full bodied Coffee! The French Press utilizes full immersion brewing. This is where the Coffee extracts the perfect amount of essentials oils and acids from your coffee grounds for maximum flavor; the preferred method for brewing full bodied coffees jam packed with essential oils for Coffee drinkers & aficionados. How to brew? Cowpresso French Press brews a Full Bodied Specialty cup of Coffee in just 3-4 minutes, simply add your favourite Specialty coarse ground coffee, hot water (89-94 Celsius), steep for 3-4 minutes and press! Features 1) 240ml Cowpresso French Press 2) High Borosilicate Glass 3) Stainless Steel finish 4) Bold Black Handle 5) L

title: Guatemala San Vicente Pacaya
description: Region: Finca Pacaya, Guatemala Variety: Bourbon, Typica, Caturra Elevation: 1,800m Type of Soil : Volcanic soil Processing: Fully washed. Wet Mill: San Vicente Pacaya. Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Dark Cocoa. Cherry. Toffee Nut. Acidity: Medium Body: Silky and Balanced Tasting Experience Imagine slurping down coffee that taste like a Christmas flavoured chocolate bar. Before tasting, cocoa and cherry aromas are eminent, complimenting the nutty and sweet toffee undertones. Pleasant coffee that is liked by coffee lovers of all appreciation levels! Farm Information San Vicente Pacaya is a wet mill nested among mountains and the Pacaya Volcano. Don Cata's family has owned and operated their farm for the past two generations. Shade grown at 1585 meters above sea level, the Catos grows mostly Pache which is a better strain of the Bourbon variety. This coffee is fully washed and then patio dried to produce a cup that tastes like milk chocolate, toffee and candied cherry. They h

title: Papua New Guinea
description: PNG Peaberry Coffee bean Region: Waghi Valley, Western Highlands Province, Papua New Guinea District: Sigri Estate Variety: Typica, Arusha. Elevation: 1,50 0m Soil Type: Volcanic soil with shade of Old-growth trees Processing: Fully washed & Sun dried. Pulped on same day of picking, fermented for a period of three days broken down to every 24 hours of washing. Unlike other coffees, the Sigri process is followed up by a total immersion of water for a further day and this creates a superior cleaner coffee. Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Milk chocolate. Candied Citrus. Strawberry. Rhubarb. Acidity: Pleasant Body: Silky with sweet lasting aftertaste Tasting Experience Our Peaberry haul from Papua New Guinea is a delicious bouquet of chocolatey and fruity notes. Before grinding, take a look and a sniff at the beautiful structure and aroma of your peaberry! Be prepared to experience a silky and complex fruity cup from this excellent Papa Peaberry. We know you will be smiling over

title: Microlot Colombia Jeepao
description: Microlot Coffee Colombia Jeepao Region: Andean, Paisaje Cultural Cafetero, Colombia District & Village: Cauca, Pereira, Risaralda Variety: Castillo, Caturra Elevation: 1,200 - 1,900m Type of Soil: Sedimentary, average number of hectares per farm in Antioquia : 3. Processing: Sun / Natural Dried Milling Plant: San Tantonio Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Cherry. Turbinado Sugar. Milk Chocolate. Plum Acidity: Medium Body: Smooth and balanced Tasting Experience This Microlot produces one of the finest coffees in Colombia simply because of its perfect conditions of growth. description: This Package delivers One 250Gram Surprise Coffee Parcel weekly for 1 Month (Total 4 Parcels) Surprise Coffees includes $15-25 Coffees from our Current offerings . You pay only $17/Parcel nevertheless & FREE Singapore Shipping is on us! description: This Package delivers One 250Gram Surprise Coffee Parcel weekly for 1 Month (Total 4 Parcels) Surprise Coffees includes $15-25 Coffees from our Current offerings . You pay only $17/Parcel nevertheless & FREE Singapore Shipping is on us! Choose your Grind size: Wholebeans, Pourover (Medium grind), Cold Brew (Coarse grind), or 10 Drip Bags Add a note at notes in cart page if you cannot find your grind size (Espresso Grind (also for our Nespresso Capsules), Moka Grind, Aeropress Grind, French Press Grind). We highly recommend getting your own grinder as the beans stay fresher for longer and you can grind on demand! Purchase option available for multiple cycles and months. title: Foundational Barista Class
description: If you're unable to find a suitable date to attend, drop us a whatsapp and we'll try to fit you in Monday-Friday 9-6pm or the weekend. Cheers! How to Sign Up? Please sign up using the calendar above which may take some time to load if your internet is slow. If unable to book, drop us an email at hello@cowpressocoffee.sg or whatsapp +6585508143 with the number of pax and date! Course Objective On completion of the barista course, the learner will be able to carry out the required tasks by a Professional Barista with competency i n using the knowledge and skills acquired to explain Specialty coffee beverages, professionally prepare and serve barista quality Specialty coffee with Latte Art. Learning Outcomes Coffee Blends, Single Origins, and Roast Intensities Coffee extraction with the variables of temperature, time, grind size, coffee-water ratio and agitation How to evaluate a coffee professionally via industry standard with qualities such as aroma, fragrance, acidity, flavour and body

title: Coffee Machine Servicing/Repair Package
description: Espresso Machine Repair, Commercial Coffee Machine Servicing, Home Coffee Maker Technical Maintenance, Coffee Bean Grinder Servicing. Here at Cowpresso Coffee Roasters Singapore , we repair: Sanremo Espresso Machines Lelit Espresso Machines Macap Grinders (certain models only) DF64 Coffee Grinders Kaffelogic Coffee Roaster Drcoffee Coffee Machines (certain models only) CAYE Coffee Machine Jura Coffee Machine (certain models only) WMF Coffee Machine (certain models only) We can service any brand of coffee machine/grinder, but if there is a REPAIR requiring change of spare parts, this normally has to be purchased overseas at your cost as it is not possible for us to carry every brand's spare parts. We would recommend to go back to your original seller who should be able to repair the machine they sold to you. title: Lelit Water Filter & Softener
description: How to use Completely soak for at least 15 Minutes in room temperature water before attaching on to your water inlet hose in the water tank of your espresso machine. Easy to attach within mere seconds! The Lelit In Tank Water Softener can be used on all Lelit and most espresso machine brands! As Singapore water quality is relatively soft, it need not be replaced after the recommended 70 litres of water has passed through, assuming you have a proper cleaning schedule using Puly Caff Detergent. For home usage whereby less than 100 Cups are brewed per month, we recommend replacing the 70 L Softener every 6 Months. For commercial usage, a proper built in water filtration system is recommended if not a replacement of a 70 L Softener monthly. This can be used for all home Lelit Espresso Machines Note: For water tanks with two tubes, one for pumping water into the tank and one for channeling excess water back into the tank, please connect the filter to the correct tube! Remove the softener wh

title: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe 1KG (Green/Unroasted Coffee)
description: Please note this is Green Unroasted Coffee beans, not Roasted Coffee. Contact us for Wholesale rates, we are keen on aiding the Home Roaster's/Small Roasting Busine ss Community! We hold more than 30 other Single Origin/Blends Green Coffee Beans in our Roasting lab as well, let us know if you are keen. Region: Yirgacheffe Variety: Heirlooms Elevation: 1,750m - 2,200m Processing: Natural, Sun Dried Recommended Roast profile: Light/Medium Roast Flavour notes: Strawberry, Floral, Juicy Plums, Citrus, Lychee, Candy Oranges Acidity: Crisp Body: Silky Tasting experience As a Pour over, Strawberry & Lychee aromas are arresting. Imagine drinking a top-notch Pu-Erh tea balanced across with the acidity of citrius and sweetness of a plum. Don't be surprised if you feel as if you have been drinking coffee in the Bahamas because the floral notes in this Ethiopian Blend is not one to be missed for you floral fruity lovers out there. Being a clean, silky smooth pour is no longer just plain joe. As an

title: Single Estate Myanmar Kayah
description: Exclusive Single Estate Coffee Region: Kayah, Myanmar District & Village: Loi Kaw, De Mo So Latitude: 19.5383°N Longitude: 97.1588°E Variety: C. Arabica, Catimor Elevation: 1,10 0m Average Annual Rainfall : 2800mm Processing: Fully washed. Sun dried fermentation on African raised bed with bags in 18 hours and washed. 75% Humidity. Plant age: 5 Years Wet & Dry Mill names & Bag type: Local Community Mill, Genius Coffee Estate & Ecotat. Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Malt. Baker's Chocolate. Floral aromatics. Acidity: Mild Body: Silky and clean Tasting Experience Grown in the highlands of the famous Genius Shan Highlands Coffee Mill! In this coffee rich region of Kayah, it is a haven for coffee cultivation and rainfall. The Myanmar Single Estate produces a sweet, clean complex cup, with bass-y malty notes accompanied by a relaxing flow of floral aromatic nuances! Genius Shan Highlands Coffee Mill is famous in this region for their consistency and generous support of processing

title: Puly Grind Coffee Grinder Cleaner (10 Sachets)
description: Puly Grind Coffee Grinder Cleaner Clean your grinder without disassembling and save your time! No more adjusting your grinder settings back a gain when you take apart your grinder to clean any longer. Puly Grind is easy to use, effective and is a Gluten-Free product for every blade or burr coffee grinder. Puly Grind uses patented technology, where there are grinder cleaning crystals to create a better quality coffee grounds, and in turn produce a more dominant espresso in terms of aroma, flavour and crema. The grinder crystals remove stubborn oils and solid deposits left on the blades and burrs by your coffee beans which impart a rancid flavour to your coffee grounds and over time could cause damage to your grinder. Puly Grind is effective yet harmless, gluten-free, preservative-free and food safe, certified by NSF International with protocol P152. Frequency Recommended to clean your grinder once monthly to ensure grinder is rid of any rancid oils or stubborn coffee deposits and coffee

title: Servicing Diagnosis
description: Servicing Diagnosis We recommend to send your coffee grinder and espresso machine for our service bundles once yearly. This diagnosis fee is for a full rundown integrity check of the interior and exterior of your machine. We will then professionally advise you the worn-out parts to be replaced (If there are any) and recommend the right servicing to be done. Good check to ensure often replaceable parts such as the Group gasket, shower screen, shower filter, cams and screws, vibratory pump, pressure relief valve, pressurestat regulator, power heat relay are in good condition. The full service and diagnosis to your espresso machine or coffee grinder usually take 4 to 12 hard working hours from our coffee technicians . Behind your lovely servicing team is technical work of such, 1) Receiving machine in proper condition 2) Inspection of exterior condition and unpacking (Damage, dents or scratches) 3) Recording of all parts present and received (Photograph proof of receival) 4) Diagnosis of

description: Gold Precision Espresso Coffee Dosing Ring (51mm/53mm/54mm/58mm) FREE Singapore Shipping on all orders Finding a better way of distributing your grounds by tapping before using a distribution tamper? Always finding that grounds are overflowing or spilling everywhere on your counter-top and causing frustration? Want to improve the efficiency of pulling a perfect shot? This is an essential tool for the professional barista! Not only does it look aesthetic and gorgeous, it's ergonomic and easy to use. title: Single Espresso Silicon Tamping Mat Non-Slip
description: Silicon Espresso Tamping Mat FREE Singapore Shipping on all orders always. Essential piece of equipment to pair with any espresso machine. Prevents damaging your lovely counter-top and denting your tamper. Being heavy, it stays and sticks to the counter-top well, this prevents your tamper from sliding around and prevent your tamper from dropping. Besides being grip-y on the counter-top and to prevent damage to both counter-top and tamper, the mat aids your tamping procedure, prevents movement of portafilter nicely so that you are able to tamp and achieve a perfect even tamp level. Made of High quality silicone, anti-slip, elastic and compact. Suitable to be used on the edge of your table, bar or counter-top. title: Lelit L58 E61 Group Gasket / non-E61 Group Gasket
description: Please note that spare parts do not come with any exchanges, warranty or any technical help. Compatible on all L58 Lelit Grouphead machines, Gaggia Classic and many other E61 brands. They fit most 58mm Groupheads but we cannot confirm that they are compatible with your brand. Water leaking from the Grouphead (area where you fit your portafilter into your espresso machine)? Is your Portafilter fitting in at 4 o'clock instead of 6 o'clock on your espresso machine? Your gasket is probably worn! Replace your new Group gasket and you will be able to have a perfect full seal. A perfect seal will allow your espresso machine to extract above 9 bars of pressure, meaning a perfect espresso! We highly recommend replacing your gasket 1-2 times yearly . Beware! If you leave your group gasket in for a long time without servicing, replacing or cleaning, it might get stuck on your group head due to wear and tear over time. This might be in the form of mild deformation, slight melting or becoming so br

title: Lelit L58 E61 Group Gasket / non-E61 Group Gasket
description: Please note that spare parts do not come with any exchanges, warranty or any technical help. Compatible on all L58 Lelit Grouphead machines, Gaggia Classic and many other E61 brands. They fit most 58mm Groupheads but we cannot confirm that they are compatible with your brand. Water leaking from the Grouphead (area where you fit your portafilter into your espresso machine)? Is your Portafilter fitting in at 4 o'clock instead of 6 o'clock on your espresso machine? Your gasket is probably worn! Replace your new Group gasket and you will be able to have a perfect full seal. A perfect seal will allow your espresso machine to extract above 9 bars of pressure, meaning a perfect espresso! We highly recommend replacing your gasket 1-2 times yearly . Beware! If you leave your group gasket in for a long time without servicing, replacing or cleaning, it might get stuck on your group head due to wear and tear over time. This might be in the form of mild deformation, slight melting or becoming so br

title: Fruitcake Blend (Seasonal)
description: Seasonal Blend, while stocks last. Region: Mixed Blend Variety: Bourbon, Typica, Caturra Elevation: 800m - 2,200m Processing: Mixed: Natural/Dry & Fully Washed Roast profile: Medium Roast Flavour notes: Forest-Berries, Milk Chocolate, Orange Peel Acidity: Sweet black-forest notes Body: Smooth Tasting Experience As a Pour over, the Blend hits the sweet spot of your palate. title: Spring Calibration Tamper (Wooden Handle 58mm)
description: Spring Calibration Tamper 58mm FREE Singapore Shipping For the Perfect Tamp and perfect espresso every single time! (Perfect for training and new baristas) 30 Pounds of tamping force. The theoretical proven amount of force one should apply on their tamper to extract out consistent espresso every time. Take the guesswork out of your tamping and rely on the calibration tamper, perfect 30 pounds of force each time. Ergonomic polished wood handle cups your hand perfectly, making it a pleasant experience to tamp. Heavy base for stability and easy to use, when the spring inside the tamp pushes down during your tamp, you will know that you have tamped 30 pounds of pressure! Fantastic as a learning tool for new baristas and to prevent wastage of coffee grounds because of tamping problems, e.g. too little or too much strength applied on a regular tamper. Please note that as this is real wood, the actual shade or grain of wood may vary. Colour: Polished Wood with stainless steel Weight: 358 Gram

title: Natural V60 Filter Paper (100 Pieces)
description: FREE Singapore Shipping for all orders FREE Singapore Shipping with tracking for all orders over SGD50 V60 Filter Paper Natural Unbleached (100 Pieces) Filters are 100% Sterilized & Air packed for better hygiene and prevention of absorption of odours. First layer is a plastic wrap and the second layer is a vacuum packed resealable zipper bag. Fits perfectly into (1-2 Cup) V60 Pourover drippers/brewers! Resealable zipper for easy storage and better hygiene. We pay for the extra cost to sterilize and vacuum pack your lovely filters because we believe your filter pour-over coffees should taste only of your freshly roasted specialty coffee beans, and not strange odours drifting through your kitchen or picked up from storage warehouses! We know this extra step makes better-tasting coffee, let us know what you think! Happy brewing! Dimensions: Radius is 10cm/4inches. Standard filters.

title: Measuring Shot Glass
description: Measuring Shot Glass 1.5oz/45ml & 3oz/90ml FREE Singapore Shipping on all orders always. 100% Glass. Durable, thick-walled and heavy bottomed. Precise line markings around the the whole shot glass for 15ml, 30ml, 45ml, 60ml, 75ml and 90ml measurements. This 45ml and 90ml shot glass can fit 1-4 shots of your coffee. Thick glass walls from this shot glass protects your fingers from being scalded from the hot coffee inside. Do not use with dishwasher or soak this in water, this may cause the numbers to come off. Colour: Clear Weight: 51 Grams / 110 Grams Dimensions: 45ml Shot Glass : 46mm (Opening Length) x 33mm (Base Length) x 59mm (Height) 90ml Shot Glass : 60mm (Opening Length) x 44mm (Base Length) x 84mm (Height) Other types of measuring cups: Measuring Glass with Wooden Handle (75ml or approx. 2.5 ounces) Measuring Shotglass (45ml or 90ml)

title: Half Caffeinated Blend
description: Exclusive Cowpresso DECAF Blend (This blend comprises of 50% Decaffeinated and 50% Caffeinated arabica coffee beans) Origins: Colombia Maragogipe & Seasonal Brazil Elevation: 800 - 2,000m Type of Soil: Fertile volcanic and sedimentary soil Processing: Natural and S.water. Roast profile: Medium Dark Roast Tasting notes: Honey. Vanilla Wafers. Milk Chocolate. Acidity: Low Body: Smooth and Medium Tasting Experience A pleasant perk me up experience for those who want to lower their caffeine intake, those who want a night coffee and for those who want to crave for a new experience. A chocolate vanilla wafer dipped into honey will be brought to mind upon your first sip! A definite joyous cup to savour while commuting to work or while reading your book before your well deserved night of rest. title: Cowpresso Milk Pitcher (Large)
description: Cowpresso Teflon Milk Jug Pitcher 600ml (Large) FREE Singapore Shipping on all orders always. Teflon coating allows you to wash off milk stains easily as it has a non-stick property! Perfect for the professional barista, latte artist and home brewer! Teflon coating has a fantastic non-stick property that allows you to rinse and wipe off milk stains easily in no time, perfect for busy operations and to avoid frustration! The smooth designed tapered spout allows for better pouring of latte art designs, especially for stacking tulips and freehand designs. The ergonomic handle also allows the barista to enjoy holding the milk jug all day long!

title: Lelit E61 Precision Shower Screen
description: Please note that spare parts do not come with any exchanges, warranty or any technical help. Compatible on all E61 Lelit Grouphead machines and many other E61 brands. They fit most 58mm Groupheads but we cannot confirm that they are compatible with your brand. Recommended to replace your shower screen yearly! Make sure the screen is not damaged, and ensure the holes are serviced and cleaned regularly, they eventually get blocked you will not get an even and full extraction of coffee! Drop us an enquiry at hello@cowpressocoffee.sg if you require any maintenance or servicing! We can help you change your shower screen easily!

title: (58mm) Lelit-IMS / Lelit Portafilter Basket (Single/Double/Triple/Blind/Pressurized)
description: FREE Singapore Shipping. Single/Double/Triple/Blind/Pressurized 58mm baskets manufactured by Lelit Italy. Suitable for Heat exchanger or Double Boiler that utilizes standard 58mm portafilters. Can be used on Bottomless/Naked Portafilter or Spouted portafilter. For 57mm, click here Purchase with the Lelit Wood/Plastic portafilter handle from us! There are 2 variations: Lelit (old baskets before they collaborated with IMS) Lelit-IMS They come in 4 sizes: Blind Single (9-11 grams) Double (14-18 grams) Double plus (18-21 grams) These are just recommended weight ranges for your coffee powder, if it's too small or big, please use a smaller or bigger basket. Perfectly laser cut portafilter baskets for precision. Not your regular brandless portafilter basket made with inconsistent holes, leading to uneven extraction of your coffee. title: Cowpresso Burr Grinder
description: Cowpresso Hand Burr Grinder Available in our value Brewing Kits. Starter Brewing Kit Detailed post on the Cowpresso Hand Coffee Burr Grinder: Click here Anyone. Anytime. Anywhere. Ever thought of owning a consistent grind for your coffee with a high quality affordable hand grinder? Who doesn't love a freshly grounded cup of coffee at one's convenience? This grinder is perfect for the aesthetic, ergonomic and adventurous brewer. Never be grounded by your grinder again. Own your grind. Each and every Cowpresso Hand Burr Grinder is etched with our cowpresso logo in white (As seen in the last image). This Symbolizes the pride in our V2 Hand Burr quality grinder meant for all coffee brewers on the go. Features The conical ceramic burr is perfect on-the-go, adjustable within seconds. Twist to adjust grind settings from coarse to very fine grinds to brew your cold brews and espresso grinds. Well-defined grind sizes will be obtained with minimum effort and time. Perfect for brewing on your way

description: Thank you for your kind support! This special pricing is available for lovely regulars like yourself who just want a reliable specialty coffee blend that is chocolatey and nutty, roasted fresh weekly with no gimmicks! Enjoy! Form: Whole beans for freshness!

title: Lelit / Safety Mark UK 3 Pin cable
description: This cable fits all Lelit coffee machines & coffee grinders except models where the wire is fused into the sockets. All Lelit machines arrive inbox with the standard Euro 2 Pin Plugs which we do not recommend as the earthing lead is not continued to the wall socket. MC269UK (Power Cord with UK IEC PLug 1.5MT) is distributed and tested by Lelit Italy . Warranty does not cover for other brands of cables used. For international use, we recommend using this plug if you are using your espresso machine for UK Electrical power sockets as the earthing is secure. All purchases from a Singapore address will receive a Safety Mark 3 Pin Plug , not MC269UK, which does not meet local regulations for sale by us. Warranty does not cover for other brands of cable used. Plug is rated suitable for all our Grinders and Espresso Machines except Lelit Guilietta. Please do not attempt using a lower rated plug than your device needs as your machine will not work properly, and may cause damage to your machine

title: Puly Caff Detergent
description: Why Clean Your Espresso Machine? Treat your espresso machine like your lovely car! Cleaning your espresso machine is crucial for not only defining the taste of your espresso but increasing the life of your machine, reducing repair costs from damages such as scale built up and hard deposits. A rancid, odd and horrible flavor will be noticed over time from the dirt, stubborn rancid oils and stuck solids of previous pulled shots. Rancid oils, calcium scale, and stubborn coffee deposits will gather and in turn cause your espresso to taste awful because of all these bitter substances stuck on the water screen, inside the grouphead and inside your portafilter. Follow a sustainable and consistent cleaning routine and you will enjoy perfectly brewed espresso always. Pulycaff cleaning sachets will remove the bitter carbon taste in your portafilter, shower screen and grouphead. Get rid of that old coffee that is constantly being burnt in your shower screen, grouphead and portafilter once and for

title: Cafetto LOD Green Organic Descaling Liquid (1L)
description: Includes Free Singapore Premium Shipping (Next Working Day Delivery, please take note of our cut-off timing for shipping dates) New and improved formula! A safe and effective liquid descaler for removing hard water scale from espresso machine boilers, coffee and milk delivery lines. Organic and NSF Certified. Suitable for consumer use. If you have very bad calcium scale build-up and damage, we recommend sending it in for our de-scale process. We use commercial grade de-scaler and specialized equipment to remove scale. Store in a cool, dry and dark environment. As long as it maintains its light, semi-transparent colour, it can be used without any drop in performance. Instructions on bottle Ensure the white cap is tightly sealed and slightly loosen the green cap. Gently squeeze the bottle until reservoir measures 100ml, remove the green cap and pour from reservoir. Add 500ml cold water to prepare descaling solution. Follow the machine manufacturer’s instructions to De-calcify, de-lime or

title: Clever Cup Coffee Dripper
description: Cowpresso Clever Dripper (1-2 Cups) Set option comes with 1 Box of Japanese Natural Filter Paper (40Pcs) or choose to add on discounted Surprise coffee parcels with the Clever Cup Set! FREE Singapore Next-Day-Doorstep-Shipping-From-Ship-Date with tracking code on this product. Comes with a FREE transparent coaster (to place your dripper on after brewing to prevent your countertop from being stained from the last drips of coffee below the base of your dripper!) and FREE white coffee spoon . The Clever cup is a combination of a Pour-over and Full-immersion brewing method. This presents a cup of coffee that has both the characteristics and flavours of both brewing methods, full flavoured, rich-bodied and smooth. This method also eliminates the powdery mouthfeel you would get from most full immersion brewing methods like the French Press as the coffee is passed through a filter. 100% BPA Free. title: Cafetto Espresso Machine Cleaner (500g / 1KG)
description: FREE Premium Shipping with this product. DESCRIPTION A rapidly soluble and free-rinsing formulation that removes coffee oils, grounds and stains. Improves flavour and aroma of espresso. Leaves no trace of odour. A measuring scoop is included in all jars for accurate dosing. Certifications Directions PROCEDURE TO BACKFLUSH EACH DELIVERY GROUP Remove coffee filter from group handle, and replace with blind filter. For daily cleaning add 1 level scoop of Espresso Clean ® into the group handle and insert as if brewing espresso. If the machine is cleaned less often, use 2 level scoops. Start cycle and allow to run for 10 seconds to dissolve cleaner. Stop cycle and allow to sit for 10 seconds. Start and stop cycle 4 more times - run for 10 seconds, stop for 10 seconds. Remove the group handle and rinse well under stream of water from delivery group. Turn off. Re-insert handle with blind filter, start and stop cycle 10 times - run for 5 seconds, stop for 2 seconds to ensure thorough rinsing. R

title: Cafetto Espresso Machine Cleaner (500g / 1KG)
description: FREE Premium Shipping with this product. DESCRIPTION A rapidly soluble and free-rinsing formulation that removes coffee oils, grounds and stains. Improves flavour and aroma of espresso. Leaves no trace of odour. A measuring scoop is included in all jars for accurate dosing. Certifications Directions PROCEDURE TO BACKFLUSH EACH DELIVERY GROUP Remove coffee filter from group handle, and replace with blind filter. For daily cleaning add 1 level scoop of Espresso Clean ® into the group handle and insert as if brewing espresso. If the machine is cleaned less often, use 2 level scoops. Start cycle and allow to run for 10 seconds to dissolve cleaner. Stop cycle and allow to sit for 10 seconds. Start and stop cycle 4 more times - run for 10 seconds, stop for 10 seconds. Remove the group handle and rinse well under stream of water from delivery group. Turn off. Re-insert handle with blind filter, start and stop cycle 10 times - run for 5 seconds, stop for 2 seconds to ensure thorough rinsing. R

title: Ethiopia Natural 1KG (Green/Unroasted Coffee)
description: Please note this is Green Unroasted Coffee beans, not Roasted Coffee. Region: Yirgacheffe, Kochere & Guji Variety: Heirlooms Elevation: 1,750m - 2,200m Processing: Natural, Sun Dried Recommended roast profile: Light / Light-Medium / Medium Flavour notes: Stewed forest berries. Citrus. Winey. Strawberry chips. Acidity: Juicy Body: Light to medium Roasting suggestion with the Kaffelogic Home Roaster : Classic Profile Medium to Medium Dark Tasting experience As a Pour over, Strawberry & Lychee aromas are arresting. Imagine drinking a top-notch Pu-Erh tea balanced across with the acidity of citrius and sweetness of a plum. Don't be surprised if you feel as if you have been drinking coffee in the Bahamas because the floral notes in this Ethiopian Blend is not one to be missed for you floral fruity lovers out there. Being a clean, silky smooth pour is no longer just plain joe. As an Espresso, floral notes are turn low towards a fruity tea nuance. Sweet berries is the outstanding flavour here

title: Lelit Mara E61 Walnut Wood Kit Knob
description: Wooden Bottomless Portafilter available as well. Official Singapore Lelit Italy Distributor. PLA2200 (Free Premium Shipping) Walnut wood water / steam knobs and lever for MARA family machines. Wooden bottomless portafilter available here

title: LELIT L58 / E61 Manometer Kit
description: LELIT PLA2400 E61 Grouphead Pump Pressure Gauge Manometer for E61 groups with fixing pin, wrench, nuts, washers and o-rings. It should fit most E61 groupheads (BFC, ECM, Expobar, Faema, Rocket, Brasilia, Pavoni, Rocket) but we cannot confirm that it is compatible with your model as the angle on some will prevent fitting. Compatible models we are aware of: LELIT Mara, MaraS, MaraX, Bianca, Giuletta, ROCKET Appartmento You should have your own M6 Allen key to remove the M6 allen key screw from your E61 grouphead. 1400181 – E61 Pressure Gauge Assembly Key 1600070 – E61 Group Pressure Gauge Fixing Pin 1600074 – Nut M10x1 for R61 Pressure Gauge 33001-PLA2400 – Label 7900124 – Instructions for Accessories PLA301S, PLA301M, PLA301L 7900168 – Instructions for Accessories PLA2400 8800032 – Small “PLA” Accessory Box (cardboard dim.int.150X90X80) 8800044 – Internal Packing “D” Small PLA Box (cardboard) 9300022 – Knurled Washer X M12 9700044 – Pressure Gauge M6 CD368-2 – Clamp X Spring Reg CIP 1–/

title: Single Estate Myanmar Kayah Drip Bags
description: Exclusive Single Estate Coffee Region: Kayah, Myanmar District & Village: Loi Kaw, De Mo So Latitude: 19.5383°N Longitude: 97.1588°E Variety: C. Arabica, Catimor Elevation: 1,10 0m Average Annual Rainfall : 2800mm Processing: Fully washed. Sun dried fermentation on African raised bed with bags in 18 hours and washed. 75% Humidity. Plant age: 5 Years Wet & Dry Mill names & Bag type: Local Community Mill, Genius Coffee Estate & Ecotat. Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Malt. Baker's Chocolate. Floral aromatics. Acidity: Mild Body: Silky and clean Tasting Experience Grown in the highlands of the famous Genius Shan Highlands Coffee Mill! In this coffee rich region of Kayah, it is a haven for coffee cultivation and rainfall. The Myanmar Single Estate produces a sweet, clean complex cup, with bass-y malty notes accompanied by a relaxing flow of floral aromatic nuances! Genius Shan Highlands Coffee Mill is famous in this region for their consistency and generous support of processing

title: Professional Rose Gold Cupping Spoon
description: Cowpresso Professional Rose Gold Cupping Spoon (Suitable for both Coffee and Tea) Each spoon comes in a Black cloth bag to carry your spoon around without being scratched Designed to perfection. Spoon weighs heavy and gives a premium feel. Rose Gold finishing for better feeling, aesthetic and durability. Strikes the perfect balance between its aesthetic and functionality of depth and curve for cupping. Made of 304 Food-Grade stainless steel, Non-Reactive and finished off with a Rose Gold lining to prevent damages against scratches. This will allow your spoon to be more durable and prevent any off-tastes from scratched up cupping spoons. Abides by Specialty Coffee Association Standards for cupping spoon standards. Dimensions: (Length) 158 mm (Spoon Bowl Width) 44mm (Spoon Bowl Depth) 12mm Weight ~ 54 Grams Every black cloth bag is meticulously and lovingly hand-sewn by our partnering manufacturer. Kudos to our partners!

title: Descaling Service
description: For any brand machine maintenance/servicing, drop us a WHATSAPP MESSAGE with photos to +65 8550 8143. 1) Cleaning of Steam-wand with Food-grade detergent, unclogging of steam tips and sanitization of steam wand tube. (Ensures your steam quality is hygienic, consistent and always clear from blockage) 2) Boiler descaling. (Ensures removal of built up of solid calcium scale residue in your espresso machine, this is responsible for 90% of Espresso Machine problems. Prevents copper tubes from breaking, boiler from overworking, parts to be moving efficiently and not blocked, pressure valves and moving parts to be well maintained and smooth)

title: Clever Cup Kit
description: This Clever Cup Kit includes: Clever Cup Dripper Clever Cup Unbleached Filter Paper (40 pcs) Cowpresso Burr Grinder Electronic Scale with Timer Silver Stainless Steel Gooseneck Kettle with Thermometer Coffee Spade with an option to 1) add a Surprise 250Gram bag of coffee 2) upgrade Silver Kettle to Black Matte Kettle with Thermometer 3) upgrade to Black Kettle and add 250Gram Roasted Coffee Learn how to use your Clever Cup Dripper:

title: French Press Set
description: This French Press Set includes: High-grade Borosilicate Glass French Press (240ml) Electronic Scale with Timer Burr Grinder Coffee Spade with an option to add a Surprise 250gram Coffee Bag French Press makes up to two cups of coffee and is perfect for couples making early morning coffees.

title: West Java
description: Please note that West Java has been discontinued. Thank you for your continued support for our West Java beans! :) West Java Indonesia (Seasonal Special) Region: West Java, Garut, Papandayan District: Papandayan Variety: Old Trees Typica, Linie-S 795 Elevation: 1,200 - 1,700MASL Soil Type: Mountainous and Volcanic soil Processing: Natural processed Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Tropical Fruit. Caramel. Stone Fruit. Acidity: Sweet and clear Body: Medium body with clear aftertaste Tasting Experience We guarantee this will be the juiciest and most unique Indonesian Java coffee you have tried. Sweet, fruity, complex and aromatic. This coffee is value for money for its complex flavour profile. Farm Information West Java Arabica, which is well-known for its trademark "PREANGER JAVA ARABICA", seems to be a new name in the world of Indonesian Arabica beans, but it actually has a long history, having been planted and traded since the Dutch colonial times in the 19th century. Gradua

title: Cowpresso Cold Brew Black Coffee (Fruity)
description: Made to order, this fruity and refreshing energy booster is brewed for 16 hours in cold water. G et some respite from the humidity with 1 00% Arabica cold brew coffee made with seasonal Cowpresso specialty roasted beans which has ZERO calories. Comes with complimentary delivery! Ingredients Water and Coffee No Sugar | No Preservatives | No Calories | No Milk | No Animal Products | Organic | No Alcohol Storage We recommend you finish each drink within 7 days for optimum freshness, but it can last up to a month in the fridge. Delivery We take 2-3 working days to prepare your order from scratch. Please see when your order will be processed and the cut-off timing for that date can be found here https://cowpressocoffee.sg/collections/frontpage Tips: Enhance the fruitiness by adding a teaspoon of honey or to taste!

title: Lelit Rubber Back-flush Disc (Alternative to Blind Filter Basket)
description: Backflush process is the same for all machines, but do consult your operating manuals for the exact process. How to backflush your machine 1. Turn machine power on 2. Ensure machine is at brewing temperature 3. Ensure there is water in the boiler, and ensure drip tray is empty 4. Place rubber backflush disc into your single/double filter basket in your portafilter 5. If doing a thorough clean, use 1 sachet of puly caff detergent and place it in the blind filter 6. Insert portafilter into grouphead as if brewing coffee 7. Pull the brew lever down for 10 seconds and pull back up the lever. 8. Repeat this procedure 5 times. 9. Pull the brew lever and ensure the shower gasket and portafilter is rinsed by the hot water. 10. Put filter holder into grouphead and repeat steps 3 and 4 to ensure grouphead and shower gasket is sufficiently clean. 11. Toss away the first espresso you pull after this cleaning process. Diameter: 5cm Looking for a 57mm or 58mm blind filter for your portafilter? Lelit

title: Cowpresso Cold Brew Black Coffee (Chocolatey)
description: No nuts were used in the development of this Cold Brew. Coffee Beans are seeds from a Coffee Plant. Flavour profile described is from the coffee bean. Brewed for 16 hours in cold water, get some respite from the humidity with this clear and refreshing 100% Arabica cold brew coffee made with Cowpresso specialty roasted beans which has ZERO calories. Comes with complimentary delivery! Ingredients Water and Coffee No Sugar | No Preservatives | No Calories | No Milk | No Nuts | No Animal Products | Organic | No Alcohol Storage We recommend you finish each drink within 7 days for optimum freshness Delivery We take 2-3 working days to prepare your order from scratch. Please see when your order will be processed and the cut-off timing for that date can be found here https://cowpressocoffee.sg/collections/frontpage Tips: If you need that sugar boost, we recommend adding a teaspoon of honey! Sweet version coming soon!

title: Cold Brew (DIY)  Kit
description: With Singapore's hot and humid weather, the cold brew is quickly gaining popularity with it's ability to give us some respite from the heat. Best brewed with coffee with fruity flavour profiles. This Cold Brew Kit includes: Electronic Scale with Timer Cowpresso Burr Grinder Coffee Sock Brewer Handcrafted Wooden Coffee Spade with an option to include a 250gram Surprise Coffee Parcel. Instructions on how to DIY your own cold brew or concentrate: 1) Measure out 1:4-10 Coffee-to-cold water ratio in weight. Use the scale to weigh out the coffee and water accurately. We use fridge temperature water. 2) Set the burr grinder to coarsest/medium setting and grind. We know it's hard work but you'll have cold coffee for days! If you have an electronic grinder, even better, because all you need to do is press a button. It helps to start from the coarsest setting because if you don't like the taste, you can adjust the grind size smaller from there! 3) Put cold water and coffee into glass container w

title: Cowpresso Gift Card
description: Stuck at home and finding new hobbies to embark on? Shopping for someone else and not sure what to gift them? Get them a Gift Card this stay home season for them to learn how to brew and enjoy a fresh cup of coffee today! The Perfect STAYHOME Gift for your loved ones and colleagues! This Gift Voucher is valid to be used at Checkout on our Website only. Available to use even on ongoing promotions. Bulk Gift Vouchers are available for discounts! Do drop us an email at hello@cowpressocoffee.sg so we can best assist you and your coffee needs/gifts! For cafe After purchase, details of your Gift voucher code will be sent to your email immediately. Frequently Asked Questions. Can a gift card be used more than once? Yes, provided there is still a balance remaining on the card. How do customers check their balance? title: Essential Cleaning Kit
description: Comes with FREE Next-Day-Courier from Next Ship Date here The Essential Cleaning Kit contains: 1) Caffetto Espresso Machine Cleaner (1KG) 2) Cafetto Organic Descaling Liquid (1L) 3) Puly Caff Detergent (10 Sachets) 4) Puly Caff Grind (10 Sachets) 5) Puly Milk Steam Wand Cleaner (5 x 25ml bottles) Cafetto Espresso Machine Cleaner cleans your Espresso Machine thoroughly Cafetto Organic Descaling Liquid cleans calcium buildup in your water tank. Prevent calcium built up with water softeners. Puly Grind cleans your grinder burrs. Use it especially after using dark roast beans or oily beans. Puly Caff Detergent cleans your portafilter, filter baskets and grouphead by backflushing with a 57mm or 58mm blind filter or rubber backflush disc. Puly Milk Steam Wand Cleaner cleans your milk wand by targetting the stubborn milk fat residues.

title: Black Gooseneck Kettle with Thermometer (for V60, Kalita, Drippers + Clever Cup)
description: FREE SINGAPORE NEXT-DAY-AFTER-ROAST-DATE SHIPPING WITH TRACKING CODE Easy to pour, coffee drip kettle with a slim spout. When preparing yourself a delicious cup of coffee, this drip kettle's slim spout design allows for easier control for the flow of hot water. Durable polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) coating PTFE coating is a fluorocarbon solid: 1) resistant to corrosive chemicals 2) resistant to extreme cold and hot temperatures 3) UV ray resistant 4) low friction 5) good insulation from electricity and doesn't absorb water. Black matte coating Say goodbye to unsightly water marks. This sleek and matte kettle will have a place in anyone's kitchen or coffee/tea collection. A great gift to surprise your product design conscious family and friends. Use with your whole collection of drippers. One kettle to rule them all. PRODUCT Stainless Steel Gooseneck Kettle with Thermometer COLOR Black SIZE W274 × D144 × H147mm CAPACITY Practical capacity 1000ml Full capacity 1200ml

description: Free Singapore Shipping to Mailbox with no tracking FREE Doorstep delivery with all orders above SGD50 Save the earth and yourself from heartache when cleaning with these Microfibre cloths that clean more thoroughly, and are quick and easy to clean because they are durable enough to endure many washes by your washing machine Colour-coded Cafetto cloths are perfect for home, cafe or office use as you will never mix up the cloths for different uses for food safety and hygiene purposes. You never want to be using your steam wand cloth to be cleaning the table and vice versa. 20 x 20cm square microfibre cloth which fits nicely in your palm and allows you to give the steam wand a quick and thorough wipe to get rid of any milk residue.
