title: Pakse Cascara (Coffee Cherry Peel, Not Coffee Bean)
description: Region: Pakse, Laos District: Bolaven Plateau Elevation: 1250-1350m ASL Terroir: Shaded with rich volcanic soil Processing: Washed pulped Tasting notes: Brilliant, Tea-Like, Creamy Body, Refreshing Finish Moisture: 9% Acidity: Medium, Bright Body: Creamy Caffeine Content: 1% What is Cascara? This is the peel from the coffee cherry fruit, not cascara sagrada. Read more about Cascara here . Tasting Experience As a concentrate using the versatile French Press, appreciate natural raisin slurply notes with a herbal body from the washed processing and mix it up with your regular coffee & tonics. We prefer brewing at 65 degrees for 10 (with some stirring) to 30 mins but it is recommended to flush the cascara with boiling water before steeping at temperatures lower than 85 degrees. Lightly brewed, be embraced by comforting vegetal notes that will keep you alert through work. Brewing the whole pulps slowly or reuse for a second steep. Blend or chop up the cascara into smaller pieces to speed by

title: Guatemala 1KG (Green/Unroasted Coffee)
description: Please note this is Green Unroasted Coffee beans, not Roasted Coffee. Contact us for Wholesale rates, we are keen on aiding the Home Roaster's/Small Roasting Business Community! We hold more than 30 other Single Origin/Blends Green Coffee Beans in our Roasting lab as well, let us know if you are keen. Region: Finca Pacaya, Guatemala Variety: Bourbon, Typica, Caturra Elevation: 1,800m Type of Soil : Volcanic soil Processing: Fully washed. Wet Mill: San Vicente Pacaya. Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Dark Cocoa. Cherry. Toffee Nut. Acidity: Medium Body: Silky and Balanced Tasting Experience Imagine slurping down coffee that taste like a Christmas flavoured chocolate bar. Before tasting, cocoa and cherry aromas are eminent, complimenting the nutty and sweet toffee undertones. Pleasant coffee that is liked by coffee lovers of all appreciation levels! Farm Information San Vicente Pacaya is a wet mill nested among mountains and the Pacaya Volcano. Don Cata's family has owned and o

title: Pakse Cascara (Coffee Cherry Peel, Not Coffee Bean)
description: Region: Pakse, Laos District: Bolaven Plateau Elevation: 1250-1350m ASL Terroir: Shaded with rich volcanic soil Processing: Washed pulped Tasting notes: Brilliant, Tea-Like, Creamy Body, Refreshing Finish Moisture: 9% Acidity: Medium, Bright Body: Creamy Caffeine Content: 1% What is Cascara? This is the peel from the coffee cherry fruit, not cascara sagrada. Read more about Cascara here . Tasting Experience As a concentrate using the versatile French Press, appreciate natural raisin slurply notes with a herbal body from the washed processing and mix it up with your regular coffee & tonics. We prefer brewing at 65 degrees for 10 (with some stirring) to 30 mins but it is recommended to flush the cascara with boiling water before steeping at temperatures lower than 85 degrees. Lightly brewed, be embraced by comforting vegetal notes that will keep you alert through work. Brewing the whole pulps slowly or reuse for a second steep. Blend or chop up the cascara into smaller pieces to speed by

title: Nanofoamer (V2, Lithium) by Subminimal
description: FREE Singapore Shipping for all orders FREE Singapore Shipping with tracking for all orders over SGD50 Main Distributor for Singapore, contact us if you want to be a retailer for Subminimal and Nanofoamer products. title: Sumatra Lintong (Roaster's Special)
description: February Roaster's Special or until stocks last! Sumatra Lintong Arabica G1 Triple Pick Region: Lintong, Aceh Tenggah, Sumatra Utara District: Humbang Hasudutan Variety: Ateng (Typica) Elevation: 1300m AMSL Processing: Giling Basah (Wet-Hulled or Wet-Grinding) Roast profile: Medium Dark Roast this crop Tasting notes: Berry Jam, Raisins, Spice, Cedar, Earth Acidity: Medium acidity Body: Medium body Tasting Experience Reminiscent of berries, raisins and plums on the first gulp and balanced with hints of the earth and cedar at the end - we love how the butterscotch berry pudding notes are accentuated with milk and it can be enjoyed as an easy hot and cold brew in your french press. The wet-hulling method brings out the spicy flavours, fuller body and lighter acidity compared to a dry hulling method. Wet Hulling Method The wet-hulling method adopted in Sumatra removes the mucilage of the coffee beans just 24+ hours after the drying process has started for the de-pulped coffee cherries. At

Sumatra Lintong Arabica G1 Triple Pick Region: Lintong, Aceh Tenggah, Sumatra Utara District: Humbang Hasudutan Variety: Ateng (Typica) Elevation: 1300m AMSL Processing: Giling Basah (Wet-Hulled or Wet-Grinding) Roast profile: Medium Dark Roast this crop Tasting notes: Berry Jam, Raisins, Spice, Cedar, Earth Acidity: Medium acidity Body: Medium body Tasting Experience Reminiscent of berries, raisins and plums on the first gulp and balanced with hints of the earth and cedar at the end - we love how the butterscotch berry pudding notes are accentuated with milk and it can be enjoyed as an easy hot and cold brew in your french press. The wet-hulling method brings out the spicy flavours, fuller body and lighter acidity compared to a dry hulling method. Wet Hulling Method The wet-hulling method adopted in Sumatra removes the mucilage of the coffee beans just 24+ hours after the drying process has started for the de-pulped coffee cherries. At
weight: 20 Drip Bags (select drip bags as grind size there is availability)
grind_size: Drip Bags (select drip bag in weight)

title: Beginner Barista Kit
description: Low International Courier Shipping starts from SGD10. Comes with FREE Singapore Next-Day-Courier from Next Ship Date here Treat yourself or setup a fellow coffee addicted friend whom you know will love this entire kit. Our Beginner Barista Kit gets you started on your barista journey with these essentials: 1) Espresso Machine Cleaner (1KG) 2) Stainless Steel Knockbox 3) Black Matte Latte Art Milk Jug (Small) 4) Electronic Scale with Timer 5) Black Rubber Tamping Mat 6) Cowpresso Monthly Roaster Special (whole beans) 7) 1 Angled Cleaning Brush with Nylon Bristles Optional: Add $108 to upgrade Knockbox to Lelit knockbox drawer which fits perfectly under your one grouphead Espresso Machine or Grinder. Space is always tight in Singapore and anything that is stackable and aids you in creating a neat and tidy workspace is a win in any Barista's book. Learn how to maintain your machine T&Cs: 1) Not applicable with 10% review codes.

title: WDT Needle Precision Coffee Powder Distributor (Black) 51mm/53mm/58mm
description: Free Singapore Shipping to Mailbox with no tracking FREE Doorstep delivery with all orders above SGD50 Master the control of even tamping and you'll be brewing consistent cups of delicious coffee everyday! By removing clumps in your coffee powder, extraction will be consistent and this will affect quality and balance of sweetness, acidic and bitter nuances. With the Needle Precision Black Coffee Distributor, you'll be brewing evenly extracted espresso every pull! Say goodbye to inconsistent barista's distribution skills! The Black Needle Precision Coffee Distributor is fit for any 58mm portafilters and baskets. It is made of 100% Stainless Steel. Ergonomic and Heavyweight. What is WDT? WDT stands for Weight Distribution Tool. How does it work? 1) Reduces channeling of your coffee which is caused by clumping of coffee powder. Why should I get it? 1) Prevent channeling of your coffee (essentially uneven flow of water in your tamped coffee bed which leads to uneven extraction of flavours)

WDT stands for Weight Distribution Tool. How does it work? 1) Reduces channeling of your coffee which is caused by clumping of coffee powder. Why should I get it? 1) Prevent channeling of your coffee (essentially uneven flow of water in your tamped coffee bed which leads to uneven extraction of flavours)

title: Tea-riffic Trio
description: All orders come with FREE SIngapore Postage to Mailbox, Orders over $50 free doorstep delivery We roast 2-3 times a week & ship everyday , please check next shipping date here Find out about our alternative shipping options here This pre-measured set is perfect for the busy person who wants to pop a sachet or drip bag into your cup or teapot to start brewing without any hassle . Our curated tea and tea-like coffee selection includes: Laotian Washed Cascara (5+ servings) Yirgacheffe Misty Valley (10 Individually Sealed Drip Bags) Mountain Grown Green Tea Blend (10 teabags) Laotian Washed Cascara: coffee or tea? Coffee beans come from coffee cherries, and Cascara is the peel removed from the fruit leaving behind coffee beans to be processed. For tea drinkers, Cascara can be likened to Fruit Tisane. As a concentrate, enjoy the sweetness of raisins and add it to your coffee as a syrup, or brew it as a tea with mellow notes. Yirgacheffe Misty Valley (Drip Bag): coffee, tastes like tea This

title: 800ml Handmade Glass Flask (Chemex Brewing Method)
description: Free Singapore Shipping to Mailbox with no tracking FREE Doorstep delivery with all orders above SGD50 Make 3-4 cups of the cleanest tasting coffee with the Chemex Method. For the environmentally conscious, filter your coffee using the Large Reusable Metal Filter. For a cleaner extraction, use the Clever Cup Filter Papers in bleached or unbleached where caffeine and bitter notes are left behind. Rinse the filter papers with hot water to remove any paper taste before placing your coffee grounds in the filter. Metal Filter fits snuggly into the spout designed for smooth pouring into multiple cups. Wooden neck around the neck is removable - transform this versatile glassware into a wine decanter or iced mint water flask at brunch or dinner parties. Capacity: 800ml Other items: Clever Cup Filter Paper

title: Cowpresso Mocha
description: Made with Cowpresso's freshly roasted beans, sweetened with Mofo Deluxe's buttery smooth cocoa and thickened with cow's milk. Please shake before drinking! Don't miss out on the cocoa settling at the bottom. Ingredients Cowpresso Coffee Beans, Mofo Deluxe Premium Cocoa Powder (50% Cocoa), Cow's Milk, Water, Sugar No Added Preservatives | Meiji Cow's Milk | No Alcohol Storage As we use fresh milk, we recommend you finish each drink within 2 days of receiving for optimum freshness Delivery We require 2-3 working days to process your order, and will arrange to send it out when it is ready! Please note that the fulfilment team does not work on Saturdays and Sundays

title: Panama Teresa
description: SOLD OUT Panama Teresa Arabica Region: Boquete, Chiriqui Province District: Santa Clara Variety: Caturra Elevation: 1400m-1800m AMSL Processing: Honey Moisture: 10.6% Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Honey Lemon, Toffee, White Flowers Acidity: Medium acidity Body: Medium & Complex body Tasting Experience Hints of lemon honey spark joy in the caramelized toffee base, making this a crowd favourite for all types of brewing methods. Pair it with your waffles, pancakes and french toast for breakfast or bring it out as an after-meal drink while entertaining. Honey Processing Method No actual honey is added, with the natural sweetness coming from the mucilage which is not washed off immediately and later mechanically removed. Read more about Honey Processing here . Farm Information Santa Teresa is a bespoke high altitude coffee farm in Panama, Santa Clara, Chiriqui Province. Blessed with rich black volcanic soil, abundant sunlight balanced with cool temperature from it's high altitu

title: Cowpresso Cocoa (No Coffee!)
description: Made with Mofo Deluxe's buttery smooth cocoa and thickened with Cow's Milk! Please shake before drinking! Don't miss out on the cocoa settling at the bottom. Ingredients Mofo Deluxe Premium Cocoa Powder (50% Cocoa), Cow's Milk, Water No Added Preservatives | Cow Milk | No Alcohol | No Caffeine Storage As milk is added, we recommend you finish each drink within 2 days for optimum freshness Delivery We require 2-3 working days to freshly prepare your cocoa, and will arrange to send it out when it is ready!

title: Thermometer with Clip for Barista Milk Pitcher
description: FREE SINGAPORE SHIPPING TO MAILBOX WITH NO TRACKING CODE Hit the right temperature for frothing milk with your Espresso Machine, on the stove, or in the microwave. Clip this thermometer to the side of your Barista Milk Jug and maintain the optimal temperatures for silky milk . Made from food-safe 304 stainless steel material , the strong thermometer is corrosion resistant . Multi-purpose with a temperature range of -10 to 110 degrees for measuring beverages like coffee, tea and cocoa drinks, this item is a must have for all beginner, novices and professional Baristas. Dimensions: 34*195mm Weight: 45g

title: Lelit 57mm Silicon Gasket
description: Please note that spare parts do not come with any warranty or any technical help. Compatible on all 57mm Lelit Grouphead. They fit most 57mm Groupheads but we cannot confirm that they are compatible with your brand. Water leaking from the Grouphead (area where you fit your portafilter into your espresso machine)? Is your Portafilter fitting in at 4 o'clock instead of 6 o'clock on your espresso machine? Your gasket is probably worn! Replace your new Group gasket and you will be able to have a perfect full seal. A perfect seal will allow your espresso machine to extract above 9 bars of pressure, meaning a perfect espresso! We highly recommend replacing your gasket 1-2 times yearly . Beware! If you leave your group gasket in for a long time without servicing, replacing or cleaning, it might get stuck on your group head due to wear and tear over time. This might be in the form of mild deformation, slight melting or becoming so brittle it is unable to be removed in one piece. Which gasket d

title: Huskee Cup 6OZ (Charcoal/Natural)
description: Cowpresso Coffee Roasters is the Official Authorised Distributor of HuskeeCup in Singapore. 100% Best Price Guaranteed FREE Singapore Shipping for all orders FREE Singapore Shipping with tracking for all orders over SGD50 Beautifully designed, stackable solid cups made with sustainability in mind will make the perfect addition to any home, office or cafe. Made from coffee husk - a byproduct of coffee processing that is often thrown away. By using HuskeeCup, you are helping to recycle waste material from the production of coffee instead of contributing to the landfills. Ridged edges allow you to comfortably hold hot drinks in your cup without fear of burning. 6oz is the perfect size for black coffee drinkers or people who drink coffee in smaller doses. No worries about your kids handling the cup. Pop on and off the Universal suction lid which has 4 holes and 1 slit for drinking. **Single Boxed Cups come with a Lid. Option to add on a single saucer with no box of the same colour** **Pack

title: Huskee Cup 16OZ (Charcoal/Natural)
description: Cowpresso Coffee Roasters is the Official Authorised Distributor of HuskeeCup in Singapore. 100% Best Price Guaranteed FREE Singapore Shipping for all orders FREE Singapore Shipping with tracking for all orders over SGD50 Beautifully designed, stackable solid cups made with sustainability in mind will make the perfect addition to any home, office or cafe. Made from coffee husk - a byproduct of coffee processing that is often thrown away. By using HuskeeCup, you are helping to recycle waste material from the production of coffee instead of contributing to the landfills. Ridged edges allow you to comfortably hold hot drinks in your cup without fear of burning. 16oz is the perfect size for coffee drinkers who enjoy their hot milk-based coffee drinks, cold brews or iced latte on a hot day. Proudly display it at your desk while keeping yourself hydrated without needing to run for refills. Solid cup for easy handling by the kids with no fear of breakage. Pop on and off the Universal suction

title: Huskee Cup 16OZ (Charcoal/Natural)
description: Cowpresso Coffee Roasters is the Official Authorised Distributor of HuskeeCup in Singapore. 100% Best Price Guaranteed FREE Singapore Shipping for all orders FREE Singapore Shipping with tracking for all orders over SGD50 Beautifully designed, stackable solid cups made with sustainability in mind will make the perfect addition to any home, office or cafe. Made from coffee husk - a byproduct of coffee processing that is often thrown away. By using HuskeeCup, you are helping to recycle waste material from the production of coffee instead of contributing to the landfills. Ridged edges allow you to comfortably hold hot drinks in your cup without fear of burning. 16oz is the perfect size for coffee drinkers who enjoy their hot milk-based coffee drinks, cold brews or iced latte on a hot day. Proudly display it at your desk while keeping yourself hydrated without needing to run for refills. Solid cup for easy handling by the kids with no fear of breakage. Pop on and off the Universal suction

A safe and effective powder descaler for removing hard water scale from espresso machine boilers, coffee and milk delivery lines. (a) No corrosion within the coffee machine (b) Safe to use on aluminium, brass and stainless steel (c) Outstanding scale removal due to a synergistic blend of organic acids (d) NSF certified safe ingredients

title: Cafetto Grinder Clean (450g)
description: If this is out of stock, order an alternative product: "GC2 Grinder Cleaner" for your grinder cleaning needs. Cleans grinder burrs and casings as well as removes flavoured coffee odours. (a) Removes build-up of stale coffee residue and coffee odours (b) Reduces blockages between burrs and internal chambers (c) Improves grinder performance and extends the life of grinder burrs (d) No grinder disassembly required

title: Cowpresso White Ceramic Dripper
description: Our ceramic dripper is a design combination of different pour-over drippers. It encompasses a wedge-like structure and 3 holes similar to a Kalita 102 , and is made of thick , heavy and high quality ceramic you would find in a good V60 ceramic dripper . Brewing with our Ceramic Dripper presents crisp and delicate sweetness , good body and elevates the clarity of coffee tasting notes. If you would like to purchase 10 or more multiple pourover units for office or wholesale use, please email us at hello@cowpressocoffee.sg Colour: White Weight: 260 Grams Dimensions: 90mm (Opening Length) x 90mm (Base Length) x 56mm (Height)

title: Showroom Appointments [Viewing for Home Use Machines]
description: ** Please let us know in the Order Notes which Machine / Grinder you want to see Excited about getting your first espresso machine, or perhaps upgrading to a new machine and want to see it in person? Maybe you need a brand new coffee setup including the coffee machine, grinder, coffee accessories for your home, office or cafe? For Kaffelogic Roasters - please limit testing to one roast only. If you wish to rent the Kaffelogic for subsequent roasts, that can be arranged! Book an appointment using the calendar or call us :) The location is at 21 Lorong Kilat #01-07 Singapore 598123 We are migrating our booking system - please let us know if you encounter any errors! For repairs, please click here for a separate booking link and different location now!

title: DF64 Grind Size Sticker &/or Adjustment Dial
description: FREE Singapore Shipping. Low International Courier Fees for Southeast Asia and world. (Shipping calculated at checkout) Did the 1st version of your DF64 / Turin / G-iota / Solo Grinder machine come with the comic-sans font and you were wondering what the product designers were thinking putting such a font on an otherwise great grinder? Well you weren't the only one. Thank goodness they have updated the font! Plus it gives you a guide on the suggested brewing methods for the sizes as well! Especially useful for coffee lovers who have upgraded your burrs to the SSP, you can change the adjustment dial and the 3M sticker or just paste this sticker over the previous one and get your reading down the middle. If you're buying the DF64 installed with the SSP Burrs from us, we'll ask if you want the sticker or prefer the dial indicator method! Cheers to a better font!

title: Haynes Lubri-Film Plus Food Grade Lubricant Grease for Espresso Machine Coffee
description: Details 113g / 4 oz tube Food-safe for heavy-duty equipment, sanitary lubricant NSF rated H1/3H Halal certified Kosher certified Made from ingredients that are FDA approved Contains no animal or vegetable fats, are absolutely neutral and will not turn rancid, contaminate or taint when in contact with food product Please keep away from extended periods under direct sunlight

title: (Pre-order) Cowpresso Pour-over Set
description: This set is on pre-order for 2 months. Please do not order if you are not willing to wait, there will be no refunds. The Ultimate Pour-over Set to kickstart your specialty coffee aficionado journey. One full set contains: Ceramic Dripper - Our ceramic dripper is a design combination of different pour-over drippers. It encompasses a wedge-like structure and 3 holes similar to a Kalita 102, and is made of thick, heavy and high quality ceramic you would find in a good ceramic V60 dripper. Natural Filter Paper (40 Pieces) - Unbleached brown filter papers that fit perfectly into our Pour-over Ceramic Dripper. Rose Gold Gooseneck Kettle - Ergonomically designed with a long gooseneck spout meant for precise and controlled water flow, granting you full control of brewing. This feature is crucial for an even brew to extract the flavours of your coffee grounds perfectly. Made of high quality stainless steel 304 and coated with rose gold plating to prevent rust and corrosion. Safe, durable and ea

title: Colombia Agua Linda (Roaster's Special)
description: Roaster's Special. While Stocks last, will be finished in April Region: Santa Barbara Variety: Colombia & Castillo Elevation: 1,850 meters above sea level Type of Soil : Volcanic soil Processing: Fully washed. Wet Mill: La Joyeria Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Chocolate Praline, Plum, Nectarine Moisture Level: 12% Acidity: Crisp Body: Medium Tasting Experience Feel like a kid at the candy store holding a chocolate coated plum. A sweet aroma emerges before the crust is broken, complimenting the nutty and sweet which pourover brewers will love For espresso drinkers, dial up the brewing temperature and try it black & iced! Milk-based espresso drinkers will savour whiffs of plum & nectarine between ships. 2 Day Fermentation Coffee cherries are hand-picked and sent to the highest part of the road and sent to the wet mill for processing. title: Grouphead Cleaner Brush for 57mm and 58mm E61 grouphead
description: Always found it hard to clean your grouphead with those nylon bristles which tend to get sticky over time if you don't clean the coffee oil off? This tool is shaped like your coffee machine portafilter and works exactly the same way too - except it cleans! Instructions to use: 1) Scoop some espresso cleaner powder or use one sachet of puly caff and pour it on top of the white silicon 2) Fit your brush into the grouphead through the same grooves where your portafilter fits into 3) Swing the handle from left to right to clean the grouphead 4) Enjoy your spanking clean grouphead free from coffee oil!

title: Huskee Cup 12OZ (Charcoal/Natural)
description: Cowpresso Coffee Roasters is the Official Authorised Distributor of HuskeeCup in Singapore. 100% Best Price Guaranteed FREE Singapore Shipping for all orders FREE Singapore Shipping with tracking for all orders over SGD50 12 OZ CHARCOAL WITH LID SET ONLY AVAILABLE ON A PREORDER BASIS Beautifully designed, stackable solid cups made with sustainability in mind will make the perfect addition to any home, office or cafe. Made from coffee husk - a byproduct of coffee processing that is often thrown away. By using HuskeeCup, you are helping to recycle waste material from the production of coffee instead of contributing to the landfills. Ridged edges allow you to comfortably hold hot drinks in your cup without fear of burning. 12oz is the perfect size for coffee drinkers who enjoy their espresso with additional space for the occasional iced latte on a hot day. title: Cowpresso Cold Brew White (COW MILK)
description: Lovingly brewed for 12 hours, thickened with Full Cream Milk ! Please shake before drinking! Ingredients Cowpresso Coffee Beans, Full Cream Milk, Water Storage As milk is added, we recommend you finish each drink within 2 days for optimum freshness upon receiving your coffee Delivery within Singapore We require 2-3 days to freshly prepare your Cold Brew White, and will arrange to send it out when it is ready! Sentosa, Changi & Tuas addresses will incur a surcharge!

title: Mexico Chanjul (Roaster's Special)
description: Few Bags Left! Mexico Chanjul Region: Soconusco District: Motozintla, Chiapas Variety: Marsellesa, Hybrids, Starmaya Elevation: 1200m-1700m AMSL Processing: Natural on raised beds Moisture: 10.6% Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Passionfruit Butterscotch, strawberry, dried citrus Acidity: Apple Acidity Body: Medium body Tasting Experience Passionfruit notes with apple acidity, add cream & milk for some fruity white chocolate notes and enjoy with some fresh toasty on the outside but soft on the inside brioche Natural Processing Method Dried on raised beds. Read more about different processing types here Farm Information At the southern tip of Mexico in Soconusco, Teddy Esteve’s 212-hectare estate, Chanjul was first founded in 1925. Today the Motozintla estate sets the standards for sustainability and Mexican specialty coffee. After the rust problem of 2012 and 2013, Teddy Esteve specially selected and planted hybrid and Marsellesa varieties which are more resistant to coffee r

title: 51/57mm Rosewood Barista Coffee Powder Tamper
description: Solid tamper comes with a raw wooden finish, apply some beeswax for a shinier look. Bonus Tip: Rotate it over your mountain of coffee powder before applying force to use as a leveller. Please choose from 2 sizes: 51mm (De'Longhi Pump Espresso Coffee Machine, La Pavoni Lever Machine, Stradivari(ESC8), Sunbeam Standard, Bodum Granos) 57mm (Lelit Anna PL41TEM, Anita PL42TEMD, Ascaso, Cimbali, Innova, La Pavoni Duet, Club, Napolitana) 54mm (coming soon for Breville, Solis Perfetta Plus) If you're looking for other sized tampers & accessories: Lelit 57/58mm Tamper Lelit 57/58mm Tamper & Water Filter Set Lelit 57/58mm Leveller Spring Calibrated 58mm Tamper Golden Coffee Distributor Precision Wooden Coffee Distributor 58mm Dosing Ring 58mm Dosing Cup

title: (51mm) Wooden Bottomless/Naked Portafilter (Delonghi)
description: FREE Singapore Shipping to Doorstep. Low International Courier Fees for Southeast Asia and world. (Shipping calculated at checkout) Bottomless/Naked Portafilter or filter handle (filterhandle) or filter holder (filterholder) for 51mm machines where the grouphead has 3 slots. Premium Wood with Stainless Steel head available in: Straight handle brown Straight handle darker brown Curved handle brown Features Detachable handle Comes with free 51mm basket Perfect for training to check even tamping and flow of espresso shots. Compatible with: 51mm coffee machines (Delonghi EC685 EC680) Not compatible with: Non-51mm coffee machines like Lelit and San Remo Please note that different machines within the same brand may have varying portafilter requirements. This portafilter is not compatible with all DeLonghi models. All Portafilters sold are non refundable or exchangeable and it is the duty of the purchaser to check for compatibility with the machine the portafilter is intended to be used with.

title: Microfibre Cloth with Carabiner Hook (Microfiber)
description: All orders come with FREE SIngapore Postage to Mailbox, Orders over $50 free doorstep delivery Features: Darker coloured microfibre cloth to wipe the dark grinds instead of using a white cloth where the grinds are very visible Carabiner Hook to hook onto your cabinet, professional standing knockbox or apron and belt at the cafe Use a CLEAN microfibre cloth, dab a corner into water, polish your machine following the grain of the panel, use a dry corner to wipe dry and get your machine spanking clean again from coffee oil residue. Keep your countertops clean Other microfibre cloths: Cafetto (3 different sizes and colours) Lelit Microfibre Cloth

title: 800ML Coffee Storage Container | Cowpresso
description: Coffee does best stored in a dry, airtight container. When stocking your favorite blend at home, avoid air, moisture, heat, and light. To preserve coffee beans' fresh roasted flavor as long as possible, store them in an opaque, air-tight container at room temperature. DIMENSIONS: 16.4CM X 9.9CM X 9.9CM

title: (58mm) Wooden Bottomless/Naked Portafilter (General)
description: FREE Singapore Shipping to Doorstep. Low International Courier Fees for Southeast Asia and world. (Shipping calculated at checkout) Bottomless/Naked Portafilter or filter handle (filterhandle) or filter holder (filterholder) for 58mm machines where the grouphead has 2 slots to fit the portafilter Premium Wood with Stainless Steel head available in: Straight handle brown Straight handle darker brown Curved handle brown Features Detachable handle Perfect for training to check even tamping and flow of espresso shots. Compatible with: Most 58mm coffee machines, please check your grouphead (selected models for: LELIT, EXPOBAR, ROCKET, ASCASO, SANREMO, GEMILAI, CASIADIO, RANCILIO, FAEMA, LA CIMBALI) Not compatible with: Non-58mm coffee machines Please note that different machines within the same brand may have varying portafilter requirements. This portafilter is not compatible with all 58mm models. All Portafilters sold are non refundable or exchangeable and it is the duty of the purchaser

title: Clean Bean Starter Kit (8 tablets) for Nespresso Capsule Machine
description: FREE SINGAPORE SHIPPING TO MAILBOX WITH NO TRACKING Please click here for new Cafetto cleaning capsules! A simple-to-use cleaning capsule that thoroughly cleans coffee oils from the brewing chamber and delivery spout. Leaving the residue behind on your coffee machine may negatively impact the flavour of the coffee extracted. (a) Compatible with Nespresso® machines (b) 100% biodegradable capsule and recyclable foil (c) Reduces risk of machine break-down that can occur as a result of blockages (d) Free from phosphates and GMOs (e) Odourless and dissolve rapidly (f) Suggested to use every 30 coffee If you are worried about the box getting crushed during delivery, please pickup from our store at 21 Lorong Kilat #01-07. We cannot control how the deliveryman handle your parcel.

Region: Villa Canales, Aldea Loma Larga Mountains, Guatemala Variety: Bourbon Heirloom, Bourbon, Caturra & Pache Elevation: 1645m Type of Soil : Fertilised with water and coffee pulp from mills processing Processing: Fully washed & Sun Dried Wet Mill: Fermented Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Cocoa Marzipan with Citrus Peel. Toasted Toffee Nut. Acidity: Apple crisps Body: Silky and Balanced Moisture: 11.7% Tasting Experience Cocoa Marzipan complimented by toasted nuts and caramelized apple crisps. A pleasant coffee cup that can be enjoyed across all brewing types by coffee lovers of all appreciation levels! Farm Information Founded in 1932, the 14ha of farmland was planted with it's first Bourbon trees, before the second generation planted an additional 23ha of Bourbon trees. Although these older Bourbon trees have lower productivity, their cherry quality is unrivaled and thankfully, some of these heirloom Bourbon trees have survived bouts o
weight: 10 Drip Bags (Select drip bags as grind size, there is availability)

title: Metal Mesh over Coffee Puck for E61 Grouphead Shower Screen (58mm)
description: Are your coffee grounds always getting stuck to your espresso machine grouphead? Pop this metal mesh over your coffee puck and easily clean your shower screen by just lifting up the brew lever. After knocking your portafilter into your knockbox, remember to remove the screen and not toss it away with the coffee puck! Hearsay says it helps with the water distribution on your coffee puck but we haven't found that it tastes any different - so this is a plus if you find that it improves for you! Specifications: Metal mesh only, does not include the portafilter 50um, 1.7mm Theoretically it should fit all E61 and 58mm baskets but please bring your portafilter to the shop to try if you are not sure. Breville, Rancilio, Lelit, Rocket, ECM, WPM, VBM, La Pavoni

title: Basic Barista Espresso Classes
description: How to sign up? Click through the calendar and find a slot! If you're unable to find a suitable date to attend, drop us a whatsapp and we'll try to fit you in Monday-Friday 9-6pm or the weekend. Cheers! Course Objective On completion of this course, the participant will gain an appreciation of production and processing cycle of Specialty Coffee from bean to cup and it’s impact on coffee flavour notes, understanding and application of different factors of coffee extraction to tweak it to your preference, the art of steaming and foaming milk with an espresso machine for basic latte art. Learning Outcomes Coffee Production & Processing Coffee Grading & Roasting Learn how to pull the Perfect Espresso Shot Brew Parameters Basic Milk Frothing & Basic Latte Art Movements Basic Maintenance for your Espresso Machine Course Methodology Understanding coffee production, coffee grading, roasting and impact on taste Application of adjusting Brewing Parameters to change and calibrate the taste of you

title: Intimate Coffee Workshops
description: Looking for a private coffee workshop with your family and closed friends to celebrate an occasion or just spend some quality time with each other? Learning Session Suitable for: Hen / Bachelors / Stag Parties BFF, Couple, Family Bonding Birthday & Anniversary Celebrations Client Appreciation Team & Community Bonding Do I need prior experience? Nope! We welcome people from all knowledge levels, from people who are just tagging along with their loved one with no prior knowledge or people who have obsessed over the smallest details to come together to explore and enjoy coffee! Structured Learning through demonstrations &/or games Does your group thrive on friendly competition or games? We can work this out to build teambuilding. Perhaps you're exhausted from the hectic day to day and would prefer a chill session while learning on the go? Coffee Workshop Programme Outline:​ Building the theoretical foundation of your Coffee Knowledge Applying your knowledge with hands-on Espresso, Milk Fr

title: Cowpress Barbera D'alba DOC (Red Wine)
description: Cowpress Barbera D'alba DOC (Red Wine) Self Collection Only At Cowpresso Flagship Store Location: 21 Lorong Kilat #01-07 S(598123) Operating Hours: Wednesday (10am - 8pm) Thursday (10am - 8pm) Friday (12pm - 10 pm) Saturday (10am - 10pm) Sunday (10am - 10pm) Monday (Closed) Tuesday (Closed) Cowpress Barbera D'alba DOC (Red Wine) Cowpresso's Houseblend Wine Award: Concours Mondial Bruxelles - 2019 Silver Medal The Cowpresso Barbera D 'a lba DOC is an excellent full bodied red wine , produced with 100% Barbera grapes cultivated in vineyards located in the villag e of Castellinaldo, in the heart of Roero region . This wine journeyed refinement 18 months in oak and acacia barrels , and 6 months in bottle . ➤ Grapes: Barbera Grapes ➤ Colour: Intense ruby red with light garnet reflections ➤Notes: Intense with sensations of ripe fruit and spicy notes of wood ➤ Taste: Very well structured, long lasting and with moderate silk tannins ➤ Food Pairing: Typical Piedmontese starters, stuffed pasta,

title: Latte Art Classes
description: 10% off Nanofoamer and Milk pitcher purchases during your lesson to start you off on your milk journey :) Next available dates for classes held at the cafe: If you can't find a date which suits you, let us know and we'll try to fit you in Monday-Fri 9-6pm or the weekend. Cheers :) How to sign up? Whatsapp 85508143 or Email hello@cowpressocoffee.sg with number of pax and the date you are interested in! Course Objective On completion of the different stages of the Latte Art Course, the learner will be able to froth milk for different kinds of coffee and carry out different movements of milk pouring with competency i n pouring a Heart, Rosetta, Tulip, Swan . Attend this as a Latte Art Series or just come for the first latte art class for newcomers or choose the more intermediate sessions for more advanced learners. title: Cafetto MFC (Milk Frother Cleaner) Powder ECO
description: Product will be shipped out January 2025 onwards! FREE Singapore Shipping (without tracking code), low International Courier Fees for Southeast Asia and world! (Shipping calculated at checkout!) Box Contents: Contains 12 single use MFC Powder ECO sachets for convenient and measured dosage every time. Features: Eco-friendly Alkaline powder carefully formulated to clean milk residue in automatic machine milk lines and milk frothers. MFC Powder Eco is registered by Australian Certified Organic (ACO) as an allowed input in organic systems. Regular use of MFC Powder ECO will not only clean the milk system but also remove milk-stone from the lines and system components. Recommended daily use on machines and equipment with high volume milk use. Daily use will prevent a blocked milk system. Quickly dissolves with warm water to make a low foaming cleaning solution. MFC Powder ECO also leaves no trace of odour after rinsing.

title: Cowpresso Cold Brew Concentrate (Chocolatey)
description: Brewed for 16 hours in cold water, get some respite from the humidity with this clear and refreshing 100% Arabica cold brew coffee concentrate made with Cowpresso specialty roasted beans which has ZERO calories. 1 bottle makes 4 drinks. Recommended 1:1 ratio with milk, adjust to taste! If you prefer black coffee, we recommend you purchase the cold brew black instead of concentrate. Comes with complimentary delivery! Ingredients Water and Coffee No Sugar | No Preservatives | No Calories | No Milk | No Animal Products | Organic | No Alcohol Storage We recommend you finish each drink within 7 days upon receiving for optimum freshness Delivery These bottles take 2-3 working days from order date to be made as they are made-in-order. Our next processing of your order and the cut-off timing for that date can be found here https://cowpressocoffee.sg/collections/frontpage Self collection when order has been made can be done at 21 Lorong Kilat #01-07 Tips: Enhance the fruitiness by adding a teas

title: Governo Rosso Toscano (Red Wine)
description: Governo Rosso Toscano (Red Wine) Self Collection Only At Cowpresso Flagship Store Location: 21 Lorong Kilat #01-07 S(598123) Operating Hours: Wednesday (10am - 8pm) Thursday (10am - 8pm) Friday (12pm - 10pm) Saturday (10am - 10pm) Sunday (10am - 10pm) Monday (Closed) Tuesday (Closed) Governo Rosso Toscano (Red Wine) The vivid and deep red of Governo is the emblem of its strong character . The nose offer notes of ripe cherries , forest berries and spicy cloves for an unmistakable and uniquebouquet. The smooth taste is the perfect balance between softness and acidity which make it and ideal companion to tasty pasta dishes and roasted meat in general . Governo is made according to the ancient Tuscan traditions of the Governo Toscano where selected and sl i ghtly dried grapes are added to already fermented wine . This is to prolong the times of fermentation while releasing the grapes substance and flavour to obtain a fruity wine with long-lasting taste characteristics . ➤ Grapes: Canaiolo

title: Le Nez Du Café Aroma Kit (Certified by Specialty Coffee Assocation)
description: Due to fragility of the bottles, we would prefer pickup by grab or self pickup from the store. The Le Nez du Cafe Aroma Kit is a set of 36 aromas that comprises of the major scents from roasting and grinding coffee. Presented in a wooden box , Jean Lenoir's aroma description card set accompanying the bottled scents are a must-have tool to calibrate your senses . A collection of the most typical aromas found in the world's top coffees, you must be able to identify them in order to master tasting fully; the kit offers a pleasurable way of becoming a competent taster by helping you to recognize these aromas. You will then be able to give an informed opinion on the cup you are tasting and convey the coffee sensations to others. Excerpt from Le Nez du Cafe: "Smell the aromas provided carefully and you will be surprised at the sheer variety found in coffee. You will memorize them as your awareness of them increases. Coffee is a complex blend of fragrant molecules, some of which play a key ro

title: Automatic Coffee Tamper Machine (58mm) in Black/White
description: Features: UNLIMITED DAILY TAMPING Electronic automated tamper for the same pressure with every tamp, perfect for cafes with many baristas with varying tamper strengths Reduce the pain or strain from repeating wrist joint movement. Compact size, suitable for coffee carts, offices, home kitchens, cafes and coffee shops. QUICK & RESPONSIVE TAMPER Quick and responsive sensor for a fast puck tamp ADJUSTABLE Adjustable horizontal portafilter or filterhandle holder, suitable for coffee handles of different heights. Choose your pressure of choice - a pressure range of 10 to 30kg to perfect your coffee. MADE TO LAST We have done more than 300000 tamps on ours and it's still going strong. Machine can be opened to cleaned if necessary. Use a cleaning brush to clean Specification: Warranty: 12 months Colour: White OR Black Pressure: 10-30kg Power: 100W Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz Weight: Approximately 4906g Tamper Diameter: 58mm Product Size: 27x19x14cm Accessories: 1 x Coffee Tamper Machine 1 x A

title: Cafetto Spectra Descaler (2x25g, 4x25g)
description: FREE Singapore Shipping to mailbox with no tracking Not sure when to stop descaling the machine? This colour coded descaler indicates whether the descaling cycle is sufficient or when you may need to do another cycle. Instructions (please consult your coffee machine manual if you are not sure): 1) Dilute 1 sachet (25g) of Spectra Descaler powder into 500ml/500g of water to form a solution 2) Refer to Machine Manual instructions on how long to leave the solution in your machine. 3) Ensure the solution has entered your machine by purging the boiler(s) and stop when soapy water from the coffee brewing water grouphead. 4) Leave for 15-30mins 5) Purge descaler from the machine. 6) If blue, repeat descaling cycle. If orange, descale is successful. 7) Clean the machine by purging with water until water is clear and has no taste or smell This is compatible with popular machines out there: Lelit, Sanremo, Rocket, ECM, Decent, La Marzocco, Ascaso, Breville, Nespresso, Dolce Gusto. If you are not

title: Indonesian Muhlisin (Roaster's Special)
description: Indonesian Natural Coffee bean (Limited lot available, while stocks last, will be finished in Mid April) Region: East Java Province District: Tlogosari Village, Argopuro, Sumbermalang District, Situbondo Regency Variety: Arabica Lini S795, Kartika Elevation: 1200-1400 A.S.L Soil Type: Volcanic (Argopuro Volcano) Processing: Natural Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Plump Purple Grapes. Refreshing Cola. Bubble Gum. Acidity: Winey Body: Syrupy Tasting Experience As a pourover, expect grape jam and Intense blackcurrants notes to hit your palate followed by a cola sweetness and lingering pleasant aftertaste of grape bubblegum. Truly an outstanding representation of a natural process east java coffee! As an espresso, expect a full-on blackberry, cherry, and molasses jam! If you underextract, you can enjoy a sweet winey acidity, extract further and you'll notice the acidity tunes to a refreshing cola note, further extraction and it becomes like a sweetened grape cola. Farm Informati

title: Huskee Cup 3OZ Espresso Cup with Saucer (Charcoal/Natural)
description: Cowpresso Coffee Roasters is the Official Authorised Distributor of HuskeeCup in Singapore. 100% Best Price Guaranteed FREE Singapore Shipping for all orders FREE Singapore Shipping with tracking for all orders over SGD50 Beautifully designed, stackable solid cups made with sustainability in mind will make the perfect addition to any home, office or cafe. Made from coffee husk - a byproduct of coffee processing that is often thrown away. By using HuskeeCup, you are helping to recycle waste material from the production of coffee instead of contributing to the landfills. Ridged edges allow you to comfortably hold hot drinks in your cup without fear of burning. 3oz is the perfect size for espresso shot coffee drinkers. Lightweight, solid cup for easy handling by the kids with no fear of breakage. **Twin pack of 2 cups and 2 saucers WITHOUT a lid** Specifications: Colour: Natural / Charcoal Material: Coffee Husk & PP Diameter: ~7cm Capacity: 3oz/88ml Dimensions: ~70mm x 70mm Weight: 280g f

title: Olfaction training and it's impact on Taste
description: How to Sign Up? Drop us an email at hello@cowpressocoffee.sg or whatsapp +6585508143 Course Objective On completion of the olfaction training, the learner will appreciate how Professional Baristas and Coffee Graders discern the flavour notes from roasted coffee. Competency i n using the knowledge and skills acquired to translate their interpretation of different Specialty Coffee Beans with varying roast levels, processing and origin into words to convey the nuances to fellow coffee lovers. Learning Outcomes Specialty Coffee Scoring on Cupping Form Usage of Flavour Wheel Calibrating sense of smell with the Le Nez Du Café Aroma Kit This class uses the Specialty Coffee Association certified Coffee Aroma Kit by Le Nez Du Café for participants to gain a better understanding of how your olfactory senses influences 80% of your perception of an item's tasting note. Pre-requisites before attending this class In order to fully understand and enjoy this educational session, participants are expec

description: Malvasia dell'Emilia I.G.P. Sweet White Frizzante Self Collection Only At Cowpresso Flagship Store Location: 21 Lorong Kilat #01-07 S(598123) Operating Hours: Wednesday (10am - 8pm) Thursday (10am - 8pm) Friday (12pm - 10pm) Saturday (10am - 10pm) Sunday (10am - 10pm) Monday (Closed) Tuesday (Closed) Malvasia dell ' Emilia IGP is a partially fermented, musk, sparkling sweet white frizzante . Stra w yellow color with light green reflections and a refi n ed perlage resulting in a typical varietal aromatic sweet smell ; s ag e , citrus , yellow rose and white flowers . The matrix of the vine also re - emerges to the taste in the refined and long sensations of the aromas on the palate which persist bey o nd the sweet yet not nauseat ing temperament and the dominance of fresh tartaric acidity . ➤ Grapes: Malvasia Grapes ➤ Colour: Straw white with golden reflections ➤ Notes: Intensely aromatic and fruity, harmonious, characteristic ➤ Taste: Dry, harmonious, rightly acidic, aromatic ➤ Food Pa

title: Ethiopia Nitrogen Flushed Coffee Drip Bags
description: Ethiopia Nitrogen Flushed Drip Bags Promotional Price (Regular Retail Price $2/Pack) If you need this item for gifting, please purchase this at our cafe at 21 Lorong Kilat #01-07 Singapore 598123 instead. Delivery services can be very rough with the packages no matter how many fragile stickers we put! Roast profile: Medium Roast Flavour notes: Jasmine. Orange Blossom. Blueberry. Black Tea. Acidity: Juicy and rounded Body: Velvety Tasting experience Excellent cup quality, outstanding fruitiness and complex floral nuances. Experience a velvety and soothing joe dancing around your palate and an explosion of jasmine and blueberry notes on your first sip. Packaging Matte Smooth Outer Drip Bag Packaging. Food safe-Aluminium Inner layer coating. Nitrogen flushed and heat sealed for extended freshness of your freshly roasted coffee drip bag.

title: Huskee Cup Universal Lids (Charcoal / Natural)
description: FREE Singapore Shipping for all orders FREE Singapore Shipping with tracking for all orders over SGD50 Made from coffee husk - a byproduct of coffee processing that is often thrown away. By using HuskeeCup, you are helping to recycle waste material from the production of coffee instead of contributing to the landfills. Ridged edges allow you to comfortably hold hot drinks in your cup without fear of burning. One size fits all - 6oz, 8oz, 12oz and 16oz Lightweight, solid cup for easy handling by the kids with no fear of breakage. Pop on and off the Universal suction lid which has 4 holes and 1 slit for drinking. Combining aesthetic design with functionality: - Ridged edges so that cup remains cool to hold - Dishwasher friendly (we find that it lasts longer hand washed) - BPA-free - Stackable - Universal Lid & Saucer (Add-on) - Products in Singapore, ships out every working day

title: Guatemala Coffee Nitrogen Flushed Drip Bags
description: Guatemala Nitrogen Flushed Drip Bags Promotional Price (Regular Retail Price $2/Pack) Region: Finca Pacaya, Guatemala Variety: Bourbon, Typica, Caturra Elevation: 1,800m Type of Soil : Volcanic soil Processing: Fully washed. Wet Mill: San Vicente Pacaya. Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Dark Cocoa. Cherry. Toffee Nut. Acidity: Medium Body: Silky and Balanced Tasting Experience Imagine slurping down coffee that taste like a Christmas flavoured chocolate bar. Before tasting, cocoa and cherry aromas are eminent, complimenting the nutty and sweet toffee undertones. Pleasant coffee that is liked by coffee lovers of all appreciation levels! Farm Information San Vicente Pacaya is a wet mill nested among mountains and the Pacaya Volcano. Don Cata's family has owned and operated their farm for the past two generations. Shade grown at 1585 meters above sea level, the Catos grows mostly Pache which is a better strain of the Bourbon variety. This coffee is fully washed and then patio dri

title: Singapore Nanyang Kopi Nitrogen Flushed Drip Bags
description: Singapore Nanyang Kopi Nitrogen Flushed Drip Bags Promotional Price (Regular Retail Price $2/Pack) If you need this item for gifting, please purchase this at our cafe at 21 Lorong Kilat #01-07 Singapore 598123 instead. Delivery services can be very rough with the packages no matter how many fragile stickers we put! Special Origin Blend: Seasonal Variety: Typica, Bourbon, Catimor Elevation: 400m - 1,800m Processing: Fully washed and Natural. Roast profile: Dark Roast Flavour: Buttery, Rich, Robust caramelised bread, Toasted marshmallows, Hint of chocolate and nuttiness Acidity: Mild Body: Full, syrupy Tasting Experience At the first whiff, the roasty aroma is imminent. One is definitely in for a rich sumptious mouthfeel and gulp of toasted marshmallows. The buttery notes pairs it's way well with the light hint of macademia nuts and complimentary mild acidity. Compulsory to-go coffee for traditional kopi-lovers who want their usual coffee more complex and sweeter in nuances with no sugar

title: Papua New Guinea Dako (Roaster's Special)
description: PNG Coffee bean (Limited bags reserved!) Region: Banz, Jiwaka Province, Papua New Guinea District: North Wahgi District Variety: Arusha, Typica, Mundo Novo, Bourbon Elevation: 1,50 0m-1,700 A.S.L Processing: Fully washed Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Sparkling Grape & Cranberry Juice, Pineapple, Cocoa Bar Acidity: Champagne Grape Body: Silky Tasting Experience Fully washed, enjoy the clarity of sparking grape with some cranberry as a pourover and cold brew, or add some milk to your french press or espresso drink for hints of juicy sweet berries! Aroma of fruity rhubarb! Farm Information Mr Joseph Nuno owns the small coffee farm dotting the main PNG Coffee Hubs in Goroka, Eastern Highlands, and Mt. Hagen, Western Highlands. Growing up in the Nondugi District, coffee is his entire career - he is currently a coffee plantation manager in the Department of Agriculture and Extension. Together with Monpi and 5000 farming households, they combined forces to build the Dako Wet Mill

title: Papua New Guinea Peaberry Coffee Nitrogen Flushed Drip Bags
description: Papua New Guinea Peaberry Nitrogen Flushed Drip Bags Promotional Price (Regular Retail Price $2.50/Pack) Region: Waghi Valley, Western Highlands Province, Papua New Guinea District: Sigri Estate Variety: Typica, Arusha. Elevation: 1,50 0m Soil Type: Volcanic soil with shade of Old-growth trees Processing: Fully washed & Sun dried. Pulped on same day of picking, fermented for a period of three days broken down to every 24 hours of washing. Unlike other coffees, the Sigri process is followed up by a total immersion of water for a further day and this creates a superior cleaner coffee. Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Milk chocolate. Candied Citrus. Strawberry. Rhubarb. Acidity: Pleasant Body: Silky with sweet lasting aftertaste Tasting Experience Our Peaberry haul from Papua New Guinea is a delicious bouquet of chocolatey and fruity notes. title: Corporate Team Building Workshop
description: Gather your teams together for our Coffee Team Building Workshop. Available both in person and online. Course Objective Through our coffee themed workshop, participants across all industries will gain Deeper Specialty Coffee Appreciation and Knowledge , and ultimately F orge Stronger Team Spirit through Fun and Interactive Hands-on Activities. Region: Banz, Jiwaka Province, Papua New Guinea District: North Wahgi District Variety: Arusha, Typica, Mundo Novo, Bourbon Elevation: 1,50 0m-1,700 A.S.L Processing: Fully washed Roast profile: Medium Roast Tasting notes: Sparkling Grape & Cranberry Juice, Pineapple, Cocoa Bar Acidity: Champagne Grape Body: Silky Tasting Experience Fully washed, enjoy the clarity of sparking grape with some cranberry as a pourover and cold brew, or add some milk to your french press or espresso drink for hints of juicy sweet berries! Aroma of fruity rhubarb! Farm Information Mr Joseph Nuno owns the small coffee farm dotting the main PNG Coffee Hubs in Goroka, Eastern Highlands, and Mt. Hagen, Western Highlands. Growing up in the Nondugi District, coffee is his entire career - he is currently a coffee plantation manager in the Department of Agriculture and Extension. Together with Monpi and 5000 farming households, they combined forces to build the Dako Wet Mill

title: Classic Square Matt Black Stainless Steel Knock Box
description: FREE Singapore Mailbox Delivery with no tracking (no minimum spend) FREE Singapore Doorstep Delivery (SG$50 spend and above) A good knock box is an essential tool for the home barista. Dispose of your espresso pucks in an ultra-durable and dependable knock box to ensure your coffee setup remains clean and free from coffee grounds. This square knockbox is made of solid stainless steel outline and a rubber bar to cushion the knocks and reduce both the noise and the vibrations on the barista's wrist. Dimensions: L16CM X B16CM X H11.8CM For Other Available Knockboxes: Professional Standing Knock Box Lelit Rectangular Knock Box Drawer Lelit Cylindrical Knock Box Drawer Classic Round Stainless Steel Knock Box Classic Square Stainless Steel Knock Box Classic Square Matt Black Stainless Steel Knock Box Classic Stainless Steel Knock Box with Pull Out Tray

title: Manual Hand Crank Coffee Grinder
description: A manual hand coffee grinder is an alternative to an electric grinder for creating freshly ground coffee beans. Features: 1. Body Material: Stainless Steel + Wood 2. Body Pattern: Textured surface for easy non-slip hand grip 3. Burr Material: Stainless Steel Metal Burrs 4. Easy to clean: Easy to dismantle pieces without tools for cleaning purposes, allows for the best grinding results and the best taste in the cup 5. Portable and c onvenient to carry: Moderate sense of weight and luxury. Ideal for home use, carrying outdoors and traveling. 6. Roughness adjustment function : Adjustable to grind the desired roughness from fine to coarse with the grinding size adjustment nut. Net Weight: 0.6kg Dimensions: L5CM X B5CM (+10CM Handle Protrusion) X H15CM

title: DF64 METAL / ACRYLIC GRIND INDICATOR (g-iota, solo)
description: This DF64 Metal Grind Indicator comes with: round metal pointer screw - this screws tightens the pointed to the burr carrier. If you turn the pointer while the screw is tigtened, it may leave scratches on your burr carrier. The DF64 Acrylic Grind Indicator comes with: acrylic indicator (hook onto the silver burr holder) NO screws For other DF64 parts, check out other related listings: DF64 Grinder DF64 Sticker / Adjustment Ring DF64 Burr Upgrades DF64 Spare Parts

title: Huskee Universal Saucer Plate Coffee Cup (Charcoal/Natural)
description: Huskee’s Universal Saucer stacks neatly and the reusable coffee cups‘ universal lid has been designed to give you a cafe drinking experience on the go! Huskee’s Universal Saucer has been designed with cleanliness in mind. It’s streamlined design means there’s nowhere for coffee to hide once you’ve given it a wash! Plus, HuskeeCup’s base features drainage vents that ensure water runs straight off the cup after cleaning. No more nasty liquid pools! Huskee products are made up partly of recycled coffee husk. During the milling stage of coffee production, huge amounts of coffee husk are created, and this husk is a natural waste byproduct. Do your part for sustainability and use a Huskee cup today! Do note that the Universal Saucer does not fit on the 3oz Espresso Cups. The 3oz cups uses a separate 3oz saucer system! All saucers are sold in packs of 4. Looking to buy in bulk? Contact us for a quote. Repurposes waste material (coffee husk) Keeps your coffee hotter for longer Comfortable to h

title: ZF64W Coffee Grinder
description: If you would like to view the machine in person, book an appointment here with us . :) White: Pre-order Black: Pre-order Features: 1. Pricing Value for money. Its single dose competition is the Mahlkonig GBW, at around 4100sgd . This grinder is more than 65 % OFF . 2. ZF54W Scale Technology Trade-secret ZF scale technology. Ability to grind by weight (by plugging in scale) and grind by time (by plugging out scale) 3. Built-in Temperature Sensor Probe Ability to measure temperature inside of the grinder, to prompt user to stop grinding above 40 °C, in order to retain coffee aromas. 4. Built-in Humidity Sensor Probe Ability to measure humidity throughout the day, useful for baristas to understand espresso flow rate and calibrate recipe accordingly. 5. Built-in Cooling Fan Ability to cool down the internal temperature of the grinder, provide lower heat, in order to bulk grind and retain coffee aromas. 6. Programmability Ability to program a single / double dose by weight / time. Manual do

title: Ethiopia Heirloom Nitrogen Flushed Drip Bags
description: Ethiopia Heirloom Nitrogen Flushed Drip Bags Promotional Price (Regular Retail Price $2/Pack) Region: Ethiopia Processing: Fully washed Roast profile: Medium Roast Flavour notes: Strawberry & Floral Acidity: Crisp Body: Velvety Tasting experience To enjoy the tasting notes, this is best enjoyed as a black coffee with ice on a warm day for to quench your thirst. Heat Sealed for extended freshness of your Freshly roasted coffee beans.

Milk chocolate is the dominant flavour here, accompanied with a caramel and macadamia sweetness and finishing off with a bold dried fruit aftertaste. The perfect one-stop solution coffee blend for any machine and crowd. Blend Information We are proud to present to you the Golden Cup Blend. Our flagship blend is perfect for any cafe, office and pantry. Love

title: (58mm) Lelit Original Black Spouted Portafilter (PL62X Mara Coffee Machines)
description: Free Shipping to Singapore Addresses This is the original black spouted portafilter sold with your PL62X MaraX Machine. If you need a spare for serving coffee or just backflushing without worrying about soaking your wooden handles unnecessarily, this heavy portafilter with the handle firmly secured onto the filterholder will give you a piece of mind while soaking in backflushing powder. This portafilter fits: Rocket Machines This portafilter does not fit: La Marzocco For other 58mm portafilters: Lelit Bottomless Portafilter (Wooden/VIP) Lelit Spouted Portafilter (Wooden/VIP) 58mm Bottomless Portafilter (interchangeable handle)

title: Handcrafted Lelit MaraX Walnut or Black Oak Feet
description: All orders over SGD50 come with complimentary tracking Singapore Shipping Upgraded your Lelit Mara Machine with the Lelit Walnut Wood Kit and the Lelit Wooden Portafilters but find that something is missing? Maybe you're still using the original Black setup but looking for some replacement feet? These Handcrafted wooden feet raises your Lelit MaraX by 2.2cm. Sold in sets of 4. title: DF64P Premium Coffee Grinder (Espresso Focused)
description: 12 Months Manufacturer Warranty. DF64P Premium Available in 2 colours Black (Display) White Features: 1. Espresso Focused DF64P is mostly designed for more fine tuning of espresso grind sizes. The DF64 has a wider range in grind size for other brewing methods. 2. Bottom Burr Grind Adjustment Swipe DF64P bottom burr, instead of turning the DF64 top burr to adjust grind size. This allows DF64P burr to be taken apart and put back together without messing up grind size. 3. Upgraded Mechanical Design for Easy Cleaning DF64P entails loosening and removing two hex keys on top to easily access the burr for cleaning, instead of turning and unscrewing the top of DF64. 4. Upgraded Aesthetics DF64P has additional wood accents for a more premium look while the DF64 does not. 5. Upgraded Ergonomics DF64P is built vertically straight (90 °) on a heavy metal base while the DF64 is built slanted at an angle (~70 °). 6. Modifiable 64mm italmill burrs upgradable to SSP flat burrs / Titanium burrs. Techni

title: Classic Silver Milk Pitcher 350ml (Small)
description: Stainless Steel 350ml Milk Frothing Pitcher. Comfortable handle, elegant design, and practical pouring spout make it an ideal tool for every latte art lover. The handle has been ergonomically designed for the busy barista.

title: (1Litre) Cafetto Milk Frother Cleaner (MFC®) Blue
description: Cafetto Milk Residue Cleaning Fluid - A high performance alkaline milk line cleaner designed for machines used at a high frequency. Recommended for use with acidic milk frother cleaner or descaler through the milk lines periodically to remove any scale build up in the lines. Safe for all machine part s, MFC ® Blue has been te sted, evaluated passed the most stringent toxicology and corrosivity standards. The ingredients and formulation of the products are safe for use, leave no harmful residues and do not cause corrosion within the coffee machine. Cafetto daily milk frother cleaner cleans and sanitises. Use daily to remove milk residues from milk lines and frothers on automatic espresso machines.

title: DF64E Electronic Dosing Coffee Grinder (Espresso Focused)
description: 12 Months Manufacturer Warranty (Home use in Singapore) DF64E Electronic Dosing BLACK - INSTOCK WHITE - INSTOCK DF64E has a higher selling price than DF64 as it cost more to produce, mainly due to the addition of electronic dosing features. Features: 1. Electronic Dosing DF64E has three dosing options available on touch screen - single shot, double shot and manual dosing. Electronic function: DF64E will grind for a predefined amount of time and then stop. Users can adjust and set the timing based on the amount of coffee needed. Manual function: DF64E will grind forever until it is manually stopped by user. 2. Designed for Espresso Grinding DF64E is mostly designed for espresso grind sizes. The DF64 has a wider range in grind size for other brewing methods. 3. Bottom Burr Adjustment Swipe DF64E bottom burr to adjust grind size, compared to turning DF64 top burr to adjust grind size. This allows DF64E to be taken apart for cleaning and put back together without messing up grind size. 4.

Manual function: DF64E will grind forever until it is manually stopped by user. 2. Designed for Espresso Grinding DF64E is mostly designed for espresso grind sizes. The DF64 has a wider range in grind size for other brewing methods. 3. Bottom Burr Adjustment Swipe DF64E bottom burr to adjust grind size, compared to turning DF64 top burr to adjust grind size. This allows DF64E to be taken apart for cleaning and put back together without messing up grind size. 4.

title: The Physics of Filter Coffee by Jonathan Gagné
description: FREE SIngapore Postage to Mailbox shipping with all orders FREE Courier with tracking code for final orders above SGD50 The Physics of Filter Coffee (POFC) by astrophysicist Jonathan Gagné is perhaps the most scientifically-based book written on the science of coffee extraction. Topics covered include physics of percolation, extraction, and grinding, as well as water chemistry. Jonathan further indulges us with niche topics such as pouring-kettle design, optimizing turbulence while pouring, the impact of fines on percolation, the physics of paper filters, and the geometry of various brewers. Original ideas are presented about coffee brewing and backed up by facts and data. "The most wonderful thing about The Physics of Filter Coffee is not the impressive depth of the science, but the practical lessons Jonathan draws from the science. Unlike, say, Illy’s Espresso: the Science of Quality, an impressive treatise on the science of espresso, The Physics of Filter Coffee offers an abundance

title: Signature Tea Blend (Loose Leaf Tea)

title: [DF Spare Parts] Metal Dosing cup (fits 57mm & 58mm)
description: FREE Singapore Shipping to Mailbox with no tracking code on all orders FREE Singapore Doorstep Shipping with tracking code for all orders above $50 57/58mm Metal Dosing Cup: While a portafilter can be used in the portafilter holder on your grinder, a dosing cup makes the transfer of coffee grinds to your portafilter cleaning and also helps with the redistribution of grinds. Using a Dosing Cup as a middle man between your grinder and your portafilter can help with a the even redistribution of grounds in the portafilter! Dosing cup made from food-safe materials. Specifications Dimensions: 8.2cm x 7.5cm (LxH) Weight: 108.1g Can be used for: DF64 / DF64P / DF64E / DF83 Should be able to fit any portafilter holder that can hold a 58mm portafilter, but we are only able to confirm for the grinder models above.

title: Huskee Cup 3OZ Espresso Cup Pack of 4 (Charcoal/Natural)
description: Cowpresso Coffee Roasters is the Official Authorised Distributor of HuskeeCup in Singapore. 100% Best Price Guaranteed FREE Singapore Shipping for all orders FREE Singapore Shipping with tracking for all orders over SGD50 Beautifully designed, stackable solid cups made with sustainability in mind will make the perfect addition to any home, office or cafe. Made from coffee husk - a byproduct of coffee processing that is often thrown away. By using HuskeeCup, you are helping to recycle waste material from the production of coffee instead of contributing to the landfills. Ridged edges allow you to comfortably hold hot drinks in your cup without fear of burning. 3oz is the perfect size for espresso shot coffee drinkers. title: Congo Nitrogen Flushed Drip Bags
description: Congo Nitrogen Flushed Drip Bags Promotional Price (Regular Retail Price $2/Pack) Region: Congo, North Kivu, South Kivu ,Ituri Variety: Bourbon, Jackson Bourbon Elevation: 1,500m - 2,000m Processing: Natural Roast profile: Medium Dark Roast now! (Not a medium roast as stated on the label) Flavour notes: BlackForest Cake, Berries, Raisins, Chocolate, Citrusy, Plums Acidity: Sweet Body: Full Tasting Experience: As a Pour over, fancy dark fruits and BlackForest cakes? You're ina for a treat then! Blackberry & Blueberry aroma are the first notes you will be hit by followed alog with sweet raisins & juicy plums. As an Espresso, this shot is really something. The rich overlay of chocolate and citrus smokes off the fruity chocolatey crema as the whole experience reminds you of a jolly good Malty Orange Chocolate Bar. title: Brazil Rancho Roaster's Special
description: Rancho Single Origin Region: Fazenda Rancho Grande Varietal: Topazio Elevation: 950m Process: Natural Anaerobic Tasting Notes: Licorice, Dried Fruits, Dark Chocolate, Tropical Fruits Body: Rich and Syrupy Acidity: Medium Roast Level: Medium roast Tasting Experience As an espresso, savour the harmonious blend of liquorice, dried fruity notes, velvety dark chocolate, and a touch of tropical fruits. When brewed as a filter, indulge in a balanced symphony of flavours, where the essence of liquorice intertwines with the delightful sweetness of dried fruits, complemented by subtle hints of dark chocolate and tropical fruit undertones. Farm Information Mr Aneite Reis started producing coffee at Rancho Grande Farm in 1933. The family business has been carried on by the second and third generation who also rear cows for dairy and meat production, and subsidise electricity and food for their team members living on the farm. description: Rancho Single Origin Region: Fazenda Rancho Grande Varietal: Topazio Elevation: 950m Process: Natural Anaerobic Tasting Notes: Licorice, Dried Fruits, Dark Chocolate, Tropical Fruits Body: Rich and Syrupy Acidity: Medium Roast Level: Medium roast Tasting Experience As an espresso, savour the harmonious blend of liquorice, dried fruity notes, velvety dark chocolate, and a touch of tropical fruits. When brewed as a filter, indulge in a balanced symphony of flavours, where the essence of liquorice intertwines with the delightful sweetness of dried fruits, complemented by subtle hints of dark chocolate and tropical fruit undertones. Farm Information Mr Aneite Reis started producing coffee at Rancho Grande Farm in 1933. The family business has been carried on by the second and third generation who also rear cows for dairy and meat production, and subsidise electricity and food for their team members living on the farm. title: Electronic Timer Coffee Scale *NEW*
description: Revolutionize and change your coffee brewings and experience Quality & Cowpresso built. High Value-priced compared to the Hario Drip Scale and Acaia. Coffee brewing should not be exclusive and expensive but open for everyone to indulge in. Free Singapore Delivery. The secret to the technique and art of brewing the perfect cup of coffee is consistency and detail. There's never too much detail and skill you can put into Specialty Coffee. Only when you truly measure a consistent brewing recipe and utilise your honed barista techniques can you truly enjoy the perfect liquid gold cup of coffee daily. The scale is designed and built for coffee brewers, enthusiasts, baristas, bakers and even the professionals that scrutinize a coffee recipe; weight (Grammage 0.1gram-3000grams or oz) and time (seconds) as the coffee brews. Hot chocolate Not a coffee drinker? Hot chocolate, Chai Tea, Matcha Latte, all options are available thanks to the 2kg powder hopper. Custom branding The large LED screen is fully customizable with the ability to add images, logos as well as custom icons for personalised beverages. Hot chocolate Not a coffee drinker? Hot chocolate, Chai Tea, Matcha Latte, all options are available thanks to the 2kg powder hopper. Custom branding The large LED screen is fully customizable with the ability to add images, logos as well as custom icons for personalised beverages. Automatic Cleaning All cleaning operations are automatic to save time and cut down on operating costs with only few minutes to start the cleaning. Metal, high capacity Brewer The pio

description: Cowpresso Coffee Roasters is the Official Authorised Distributorof HuskeeCup in Singapore. 100% Best Price Guaranteed FREE Singapore Shipping for all orders FREE Singapore Shipping with tracking for all orders over SGD50 INTRODUCING HUSKEE RENEW 50% Post Consumer Recycled Tritan Plastic HUSKEE Renew saucers for 3oz cups ONLY. PACK OF 4. Durable, Dishwasher-Safe, BPA-Free, Stain Resistant Featuring the identical iconic fins as HuskeeCup, Renew is made from a trademarked Co-polyester, has a glass-like appearance, and is made from 50% recycled material We know you want information that is credible, well-supported and easy to understand. Tritan is impact-resistant — products can be used without fear of shattering. Tritan is tough — extending the useful life of water bottles and food containers, potentially reducing

title: DrCoffee SC15 Milk Fridge
description: Cowpresso is an Authorised DrCoffee Singapore Distributor and Repair Centre. Milk refrigerator Dr. Coffee SC15. Dr. Coffee makes sure that coffee with silky milk foam is always made only from chilled, fresh milk. The standing milk refrigerator SC15 is designed to keep milk cool, that is, at the perfect temperature for making coffee. The extra roomy, quiet refrigerator can hold up to four milk cartons. It remains to insert only one tube to provide maximum convenience of use and allow you to enjoy each cup of coffee without pouring additional milk, but the particularly simple touch controls and the adjustable refrigerator temperature (from 8 to 18 ℃) allow you to choose the optimal option according to your needs. Fresh chilled milk is the guarantee of a perfectly prepared milk coffee drink. Weight: 8.5 kg Size: 25.2 × 51.2 × 45 cm Capacity: 10 l Color: Black Temperature range: 8℃ – 18℃ Security lock Overvoltage protection Air-cooled and frost-free Intelligent touch Temperature Setting

title: DF64V Variable Speed Grinder
description: COWPRESSO is the Official Authorised Distributor for DF64 in Singapore. For Singapore order - Pickup instore so that we can run through the machine with you properly and avoid user damage. Variable speed single dose DF64V. Grind from 600-1,800 RPM. Comes in Black, Silver and Grey Colour. Silver limited instock Grey limited instock Black pre-order. You can consider the Black CF64V Coffee Grinder or the Black DF83V Coffee Grinder which are vertical burr grinders. If you would like to consider a conical burr grinder, you can consider the Black DC63. Fitted with: DLC 64MM Default Burrs or upgraded burrs Rubber Bellow Wooden Lid Wooden Base Metal Cup Metal declumper flap instead of plastic piece. It does not come with any spray bottle - the brochure may be an old one if it indicates otherwise. The DF64V grinder is suitable for any coffee enthusiast, be it home or professional who brews different coffee brewing methods. It is a full-range grinder, meaning, it can grind espresso, filter, and

title: Costa Rica Finca Aquiares (ROASTER'S SPECIAL)
description: Costa Rica Finca Aquiares (ROASTER'S SPECIAL) Region: Turrialba Varietal: Marsellesa & Obat á Elevation: 1,100 to 1,400 metres above sea level Process: 24 Hour Anaerobic Natural (Read more about Anaerobic Natural Process here) Tasting Notes: Boozy kyoho grapes. Blueberry. Ripened tropical fruits, grounded by sweet dark chocolate, spices and a lovely floral aftertaste. Body: Medium Acidity: Citrusy Roast Level: Light Filter Tasting Experience This blend, crafted for a filter brew, delivers a captivating and harmonious cup. The initial sip unfolds with a reminiscent wine-like sweetness that evolves in intensity as the coffee cools. Alongside this, a gradual emergence of soft dark chocolate sweetness adds depth to the overall tasting experience! The interplay of fruity, chocolatey, and spicy notes, coupled with a lingering floral finish, crafts a multi-layered and inspiring journey for your palate. Farm Information Aquiares, among Costa Rica's largest and oldest coffee farms, stands proud

Two different nano-screens are included with the NanoFoamer. These create slightly different textured milk. Note that the NanoFoamer can also be used without a screen to create normal foam or for mixing drinks. High speed and high torque electric motor delivers the performance required for creating silky smooth microfoam. The protective case keeps the shaft, impeller, and nano-screen protected inside your

title: FLICK Retractable WDT Pen by Subminimal
description: The Flick espresso distribution tool (WDT) is intuitive, fun to use, and safe, thanks to its retractable needles. One-click pops the needles out when you need them, and a flick of the wrist sends them right back in. Puck prep has never been so much fun. title: UPSHOT Espresso Shot Mirror by Subminimal
description: Use the UpShot espresso shot mirror with a bottomless portafilter to gain insights into your extraction, check for channeling, and whether your grind size is right. The UpShot mirror is unique as it sits on the edge of the cup, bringing that mirror closer to your portafilter and giving you a better close-up look at the extraction. The UpShot mirror is made from ultra-thin tempered and edgeless glass and ships with an adhesive magnetic dot so that it can easily be magnetized to your espresso machine or near your coffee station. title: Coffee Class Vouchers
description: What better gift than the gift of knowledge? And GREAT COFFEE! A Perfect gift for the Coffee Aficionados in your life! Any one of the following classes hosted by Cowpresso Coffee Roasters! 1) Espresso Calibration Class (120 Minutes) 2) Pourover Class (120 Minutes) 3) Latte Art Class (90 Minutes) 4) Introduction to Specialty Coffee / Foundational Barista Class (120 Minutes) 5) Olfaction and Sensory Training (120 Minutes) Please add in the notes the name of the recipient of your gift. Send them the order confirmation page and have them drop us a Whatsapp at 85508143 to book their class time!

title: DF54 54mm Flat Burr Grinder
description: Do not use credit card to purchase the paynow/bank transfer price. Transaction fees are non-refundable and will be charged to your order. Differences between DF64 and DF54 DF54 grinds slower than DF64 DF64 grind shape and flavour conservation is slightly better even due to burr size and shape. DF64 Motor is stronger DF54 uses 54mm burr whereby DF64 uses 64mm burr with options of SSP and DLC Features and Specifications 54 mm Grinding Plasma Generator Anti-Popcorn 58mm Food Grade Aluminum Dosing Cup True Zero Retention <0.1 gram Stepless Adjustment Bean Hopper Capacity: 30 grams without bellow, 80 grams with bellow Specifications: Weight: 4.5KG Size: 18 x 11.5 x 30.5 cm 220V-240V 50/60Hz Set comes with: Grind size indicator Plastic cup Tilting adapter Rubber bellow and wooden lid Please note that this is a home-use grinder.
