title: Bottled Water Dispensing System (Like Flojet)
description: 220V Electrical Water Pump for Dispensing Bottled water. This Bottled water dispensing system is designed for supplying coffee and tea makers, espresso machines, air-con condenser accumulation liquid removal, refrigerators, ice machines and water dispensers. Made to use with 5 Gallon (20L) Water bottles but will also work with other size water containers. Pump Shuts off when sensor senses that water runs out to prevent damage. Helps to maintain a consistent water pressure for optimal coffee extraction and prevent damage to your espresso machine's water system. Can be used with a variety of coffee machines, including commercial. Features Quick Connect for easy set up and tear down. Silent Operation Special internal mould design to ensure pump is softer than other brands Float Switch For auto Shut off when bottle is empty Built in no-return valve to prevent back flow of water Fits most water bottles Super compact and Portable Specification 110V - 240V AC 50/60Hz 0.5A Max Flow: 1 Gallon/

title: Lelit Water Tank for Anna/Anita PLA8330
description: Not used to the small hole in the original water tank that comes with your Lelit Anna PL41TEM and Lelit Anita PL42TEMD machine? Purchase this open water tank instead which has a bigger hole to allow you to pour more water in Self collection at 21 Lorong Kilat #01-07 Singapore 598123 due to fragility of the item and delivery services being rough with this item. This item is NOT COMPATIBLE with the Lelit MaraX or Lelit Bianca Please check your machine model carefully before purchase. There are no refunds or exchanges for spare parts.

title: DF83V
description: Do not use credit card to purchase the paynow/bank transfer price. Transaction fees are non-refundable and will be charged to your order. Meet the DF83V, the epitome of coffee grinding perfection in its new generation. This grinder embodies a seamless fusion of aesthetic appeal and practical utility, meticulously honed through steadfast commitment. Building upon the triumph of its predecessor, the DF83, it introduces a plethora of improvements in construction, materials, and design, all tailored to elevate your coffee crafting experience. The DF83V is meticulously crafted with a focus on durability, effectiveness, and an elegant appearance. This sleek 83mm grinder, equipped with adjustable speed settings, stands as the result of our comprehensive exploration and advancement in grinder technology. Colours: Silver Black Features and Specifications 83 mm DLC Grinding burr (Choose from Espresso to Brew burrs) Adjustable RPM Grinding speed 300 to 1,600 RPM Powerful DC Brushless Motor ensure

title: Guatemala Geisha El Mirador (Roaster's Special)
description: Curated Geisha beans, just for you! Region: San Pedro Yepocapa, Acatenango, Guatemala Variety: Geisha Elevation: 1,500 metres A.S.L Type of Soil : Volcanic soil Processing: Fully Washed & Sun Dried Wet Mill: Wet hulled & Fermented Roast profile: Light Filter Tasting notes: Juicy stone fruit, Fragrant Jasmine tea, Bergamot, Spiced Cider. Acidity: Sauternes acidity Body: Balanced Moisture: 11.7% Tasting Experience: Juicy sweet yellow peach with rose and jasmine florals. Honey and black tea. Balanced with a rounded body with notes of creamy cashew. Farm Information: The De la Roca family ran the farm for 40 years until in 2015 the land was sold to Stuardo Coto, who added it to his Panorama Estate. The organization is dedicated to growing coffee with respect to the environment whilst ensuring high quality is maintained. Region: San Pedro Yepocapa, Acatenango, Guatemala Variety: Geisha Elevation: 1,500 metres A.S.L Type of Soil : Volcanic soil Processing: Fully Washed & Sun Dried Wet Mill: Wet hulled & Fermented Roast profile: Light Filter Tasting notes: Juicy stone fruit, Fragrant Jasmine tea, Bergamot, Spiced Cider. Acidity: Sauternes acidity Body: Balanced Moisture: 11.7% Tasting Experience: Juicy sweet yellow peach with rose and jasmine florals. Honey and black tea. Balanced with a rounded body with notes of creamy cashew. Farm Information: The De la Roca family ran the farm for 40 years until in 2015 the land was sold to Stuardo Coto, who added it to his Panorama Estate. The organization is dedicated to growing coffee with respect to the environment whilst ensuring high quality is maintained. His team diligently monitors the soil fertility, pruning, fertilizing, and pest management of each farm within the organization. The slopes of Finca El Mirador are filled w

title: Ethiopian Guji Shakiso
description: Region: Guji, Oromia Variety: Heirlooms Elevation: 1,750m - 1,950m ASL Processing: Washed, Sun Dried Roast profile: Light Flavour notes: Citrus zest, Marmalade, Floral Sweet, Berries. Acidity: Balanced Body: Medium Tasting experience As a Pour over, Sweet Floral and Marmalade notes takes the stage. Imagine sipping an indulgent, citrusy tea with balanced acidity and creamy body of a soursoup fruit. The Ethiopia Guji Shakiso finishes with a floral notes similar to our Yirgacheffe roasted coffee blend, as to be expected of an Ethiopian single origin. Clean, smooth and balanced; perfect for a relaxing Saturday afternoon. As an Espresso, floral notes gives way to a fruity tea experience. Sweet, citrusy notes takes front and center with this brewing method with it's indulgent cranberry notes and mouthfeel. Farm Information The Ethiopian Guji Shakiso was developed with a remarkable level of care through every step of the process. Ethiopia, the birthplace of coffee, is full of natural coffee p

title: COFFEEPRO Water Filter Triple Stage (Cartridge/Full Set)
description: Undersink Filters for use with kitchen appliances to reduce scaling in machines. Installation charged separately Filter Sizes Available: Small: 250mm x 130mm x 410mm: 50,000L - 70,000L Big: 750mm x 130mm x 610mm: 70,000L - Filters have to be replaced after 12 - 18 months, or after useage with the stipulated capacity, whichever comes first. title: Uganda Bugisu Washed 1KG (Green/Unroasted Coffee)
description: Please note this is Green Unroasted Coffee beans, not Roasted Coffee. Region: Uganda Bugisu Variety: SL 14 , SL 28 Elevation: 1,400 - 2,200m Processing: Fully washed Recommended roast profile: Medium / Medium-Dark Flavour notes: Black dates. Nuts. Honeycomb. Citrus zest. Acidity: Green grapes Body: Medium Tasting experience As an Espresso, this shot is outstandingly similar to a Port wine. The aromas of orange zest and sweet grapes perfumes off its crema as a subtle warming smell and hint of woodsiness seals the overall flavour perception and experience like a warm body. Sweet grapes, Citrus, Woodsy and Memorable. Great as a winey finish. As it cools, the flavour mellows out to chocolate and a pronounced taste of Figs. Roasting experience: I t’s a challenging beans to be roasted, gentle energy required after first crack especially Roasting suggestion with the Kaffelogic Home Roaster : Classic Profile Medium to Medium Dark Moisture content of Green Coffee: 10.6% Packaging Premium White

title: Ethiopian Guji Shakiso
description: Region: Guji, Oromia Variety: Heirlooms Elevation: 1,750m - 1,950m ASL Processing: Washed, Sun Dried Roast profile: Light Flavour notes: Citrus zest, Marmalade, Floral Sweet, Berries. Acidity: Balanced Body: Medium Tasting experience As a Pour over, Sweet Floral and Marmalade notes takes the stage. Imagine sipping an indulgent, citrusy tea with balanced acidity and creamy body of a soursoup fruit. The Ethiopia Guji Shakiso finishes with a floral notes similar to our Yirgacheffe roasted coffee blend, as to be expected of an Ethiopian single origin. Clean, smooth and balanced; perfect for a relaxing Saturday afternoon. As an Espresso, floral notes gives way to a fruity tea experience. Sweet, citrusy notes takes front and center with this brewing method with it's indulgent cranberry notes and mouthfeel. title: Guji Ethiopia Yirgacheffe Washed 1KG (Green/Unroasted Coffee)
description: Please note this is Green Unroasted Coffee beans, not Roasted Coffee. Soil depth > 1.5m Processing: Fully washed Recommended roast profile: Light / Light-medium Flavour notes: Citrus. Floral. Jasmine. Marmalade. Experience a velvety and soothing joe dancing around your palate and an explosion of jasmine and blueberry notes on your first sip. title: Lemon Ginger Honey Tea (Loose Leaf Tea)
description: This tea is non-caffeinated. Perfect for you and your friends who can't have caffeine. Flavour Notes: Lemon mixed with a scent of ginger and layered with natural sweetness Directions: Soak for at least 15 mins for honey flavours to come out. 3g of tea - adjust to taste. Serving: 20 servings per packet. These are not individually packed and you can scoop out the volume you need. Shelf-Life: Use within a year for freshness Premium White Matte Block Bottom Pouches with One-way valve & Easy-Tear Resealable Zipper. Heat Sealed for extended freshness. Outer Packaging: Premium White Matte Block Bottom Pouches with One-way valve & Easy-Tear Resealable Zipper. Heat Sealed for extended freshness.

title: KAFFELOGIC Nano 7 BOOSTER KIT ONLY
description: BOOST YOUR EXPERIENCE Use the product code to unlock variable batch size and roast between 50g up to 180-200g. Reduce wastage or get more roasts out of your coffee. Roast every day or once a week for your home. Scale the batch size to suit your sample’s size rather than wasting green or compromising on quality. This unlocks a code which allows you to boost the coffee according to the correct weight. Your package comes with two cylindrical extensions to add on top of your roaster. Please note that if your beans are not circulating well at 200g, you will need to add less coffee by reducing your green beans weight to 180g. Moisture content vary across different beans, and you will need to adjust your fan speed or weight of green coffee in your roaster for optimal air circulation so your beans can rotate.

title: Lelit MARAX Grouphead Paddle and Manometer Kit
description: FREE Singapore Postage to Mailbox shipping with all orders FREE Postage with tracking code for final orders above SGD50 SELECTED MATERIALS The wooden paddle is currently available in 3 different colours to match your kit: 1) Walnut 2) Black Wood 3) Zebrano 4) Maple (Pre-order only September 2024. Do not order this if you cannot wait as there are no refunds) L58E manometer has a white round display with a scale bar and red LELIT logo. With a very rare aesthetic to match the limited edition gold MaraX and Bianca machines, the Zebrano wood paddle gives it's user of the MaraX coffee machine a unique mix of eccentricity and elegance. DELIVERED WITH It consist of: 1) Wood paddle 2) L58E manometer 3) Flow regulator and restictors. 4) It includes assembly instructions and all necessary components. There is no warranty on spare parts purchased, and we are not responsible for any damages to your item before, during and after installation. Please be mindful during installation not to: over-tighte

title: COFFEEPRO Water Filter Double Stage (Cartridge/Full Set)
description: Undersink Filters for use with kitchen appliances to reduce scaling in machines. title: BARISTA GRADE MATCHA
description: Find out about your shipping options here 100% Barista Matcha from the freshest crop available - we ship our stock in smaller batches in order to keep the quality fresh for our own usage too. The barista Matcha is strong and grassy, so add some honey or syrup for sweetness. If you prefer lighter grassy drink, add less than 3g of matcha powder or try our ceremonial grade matcha instead for more balance. The Matcha is not mixed or watered down, so you will need to modify your recipe to add sugar syrup into your drinks. 2 types of packaging: 1) Box of 30g (10 servings for hot drinks) 2) 1kg packaging For cafes purchasing above 6kg of Barista Matcha, kindly drop your company details to us at hello@cowpressocoffee.sg or whatsapp +65 85508143 For our other tea selection: Barista Matcha Whisk Set Barista Matcha Nanofoamer Set Barista Grade Matcha Ceremonial Grade Matcha Hojicha Loose Leaf Teas

Custom Powder-Coated Coffee Machine: A Unique Brew Companion Are you tired of the same old stainless steel coffee machines? Step into the world of bespoke coffee brewing with our custom powder-coated coffee machine. Crafted specially for someone who appreciate both aesthetics and functionality, this one-of-a-kind appliance is a conversation starter whether you plan it to put the coffee machine in your home, office or cafe. Why Powder-coating and not Spray-painting? Artistic Finish : Each machine undergoes a meticulous powder coating process, resulting in a unique, eye-catching appearance. Say goodbye to scratches and fading; your coffee machine will

title: Jute Bags
description: Upcycled Coffee Jute Bags Support sustainability with our Upcycled Coffee Jute Bags, repurposed from green coffee bean jute bags used in our roastery. Each bag has a unique story, originally housing our imported green coffee beans. Perfect for DIY projects such as rustic-style upholstery, eco-friendly shopping totes, sustainable gift wrap or even wall art. The rugged texture and earthy tones of jute complement any eco-conscious lifestyle or decor. Make a difference with every purchase by embracing sustainability through creativity. Whether you're a craft enthusiast or looking to enhance your home with a touch of eco-conscious style, our upcycled Coffee Jute Bags offer a meaningful and practical solution. *Please note that the jute bags will be provided at random and cannot be chosen specifically.

title: 51-54mm Espresso Dosing Ring in Black for Breville
description: FREE Singapore Shipping on all orders This is for Breville only. Please view other listing for our other varieties of dosing rings We tested with our 51mm and 54mm portafilters and it fits. Please note that we are unable to promise that it will fit your portafilter. Please book an appointment to come try at the shop if you need to. Finding a better way of distributing your grounds by tapping before using a distribution tamper? Always finding that grounds are overflowing or spilling everywhere on your counter-top and causing frustration? Want to improve the efficiency of pulling a perfect shot? This is an essential tool for the professional barista! Not only does it look aesthetic and gorgeous, it's ergonomic and easy to use. By utilizing a dosing ring, you'll find yourself brewing better tasting and better consistent espressos. description: Expertly crafted from natural walnut and birch materials, this Walnut Knockbox Chute with Tamper Holder is not only visually appealing but also durable and safe for your coffee-making needs. Equipped with a stable slot design and a removable stainless steel coffee grounds box , this accessory allows for easy and efficient powder pressing and cleaning. title: Colombian Excelso
description: Region: Huila, Pitalito, Colombia Variety: Castillo, Caturra Elevation: 1,400m - 1,800m ASL Processing: Washed Roast profile: Medium-Dark Tasting notes: Trilogy of cocoa, nut & tangerine. Acidity: Ripe Peckham pear Body: Medium - Full Tasting Experience As an Espresso, Colombian Excelso takes you on a journey through rich and layered flavours. This coffee introduces itself with a trilogy of cocoa, nut, and tangerine—a combination that brings a balance of deep, earthy notes and a bright, citrus twist. As the espresso settles, you’ll notice the smooth sweetness of brown sugar warmly weaving its way through the cup. This is quickly followed by a satisfying finish of dark chocolate that lingers — leaving a rich, slightly bittersweet impression. Whether you’re savouring it as an espresso shot or in a milk-based drink, Colombian Excelso delivers a refined yet bold espresso experience, perfect for those who appreciate depth and complexity in their cup. Farm Information Colombia is a must-try

title: Self Levelling Spring Calibration Tamper (Black 58mm)
description: Self Levelling Spring Calibration Tamper 58mm FREE Singapore Shipping (2-3 working days) on this product. For the Perfect Tamp and perfect espresso every single time! (Perfect for training and new baristas) Take the guesswork out of your tamping with this tamper that sits on the edges. Press down and how deep it goes depends on the volume of coffee in your basket. Ergonomic black handle cups your hand perfectly, making it a pleasant experience to tamp. Heavy base for stability and easy to use, when the spring inside the tamp pushes down during your tamp, you will know that you have tamped a perfectly level coffee! Fantastic as a learning tool for new baristas and to prevent wastage of coffee grounds because of tamping problems, e.g. too little or too much strength applied on a regular tamper. Colour: Black Handle Dimensions: For 58mm machines

title: Ship To Wreck: Chocolate Flakes
description: Made in Australia FREE Singapore Singpost Normal Mail FREE Courier Shipping with tracking code for orders over SGD These super vasatile chocolate flakes are made from dark Peruvian cocoa liquor, blended with luscious cocoa butter and a little organic sugar. Simply spread over warm or iced chocolate for a perfect finish! To use: Measure a large 5g scoop. Cast over warm, or iced drinking chocolate. Or try 150ml of moo milk, measure 35g scoop & steam or heat over stove. GMO & GLUTEN FREE | HALAL CERTIFIED | KOSHER PAREVE CERTIFIED | CELIAC & VEGAN CERTIFIED* | PART OF ONE PERCENT COLLECTIVE | FILLER FREE** Cowpresso is the sole distributor for Ship To Wreck: Chocolate Flakes in Singapore. title: Fiorenzato Allground Sense Coffee Grinder
description: Discover Fiorenzato Allground today at Cowpresso! The Allground Fiorenzato Sense is a Grind By Weight Coffee Grinder, which eliminates the need for weighing your coffee beans and single dosing. Perfect for home use, small offices and small cafe use. Colours we sell: Black: Pre-order Price White: Pre-order Price White with Walnut: Pre-Order Price Pastel Blue: Instock last piece Copper: Pre-order Price We have tested this on our coffee carts for events and it has worked wonderfully, but please note that any warranty only covers Manufacturer's defects and not any wear & tear on the burrs or parts. Please approach us to see the grinders in person to see if this is suitable for you :) If your business is based on volume, we would highly recommend our Mi40 Macap grinders and better models instead. title: Subminimal Subscale (Coffee Scale)
description: Free Shipping for Singapore orders, T&Cs here! Dose. Grind. Brew. Features of the Subscale Small & Compact for your Single Dosing Needs Tritan body is food-safe and usable across hot or cold, wet or dry with IPX-4 splash resistance - wipe clean only 400mAh battery with USB-C charging Always powered on and ready for you: Press the button for 2s to turn it off, or let it auto-shut off when done. title: Latte Art Liquid
description: All orders come with FREE SIngapore Postage to Mailbox Orders over $50 free tracking delivery Designed to emulate the texture of steamed milk, Latte Art Liquid offers a practical and eco-friendly alternative to traditional dairy milk for creating latte art. Purchase this together with the Superpresso! Key Features : Dairy-free : No animal products used. Long-lasting : Stable at room temperature. Compact size : Easy to store and handle. Not edible: Do not drink. This is just for practice. Instructions : Combine 1g of Latte Art Liquid with 240-260ml of cold water (or water with 2-5 ice cubes). Pour the mixture into your steaming jug and steam as you would with regular milk. Enjoy! (Please DO NOT drink this. It is NOT EDIBLE)

title: DF54 Plastic Pointer
description: This pointer is meant only for the DF54 Coffee Grinder. This does not include the screw.

title: KAFFELOGIC Nano 7 Home Roaster Carry Bag
description: If you would like purchase this item for pickup, please make a booking here and put in the notes "I would like to purchase and pickup a Kaffelogic Carry Bag". This carry on bag will fit any machines manufactured by Kaffelogic, including the Nucleus Link which is exactly the same housing. This listing does not include the Kaffelogic Coffee Roaster, please purchase it separately. The purchase of the roaster does not come with a bag, so this is the perfect tool to keep your roaster snug on your coffee adventures. Delivery will normally take up to 3 business days and we apologise that we cannot control the delivery schedule by Speedpost. Special Origin Blend: Indonesia, Uganda Bugisu Variety: Old Trees Typica, SL 14 , SL 28 Elevation: 1,200m - 2,200m ASL Processing: Natural & Washed Roast profile: Medium Roast Flavour: Stone fruit sweetness, Orange chocolate Acidity: Winey & Citric Body: Medium Tasting Experience As a pourover, this is the go-to coffee to revel your friends & family with at home! A perfectly fruity, aromatic cup of tart-sweet goodness with bright, sparkly chocolatey notes to round it off. An excellent coffee for this festive season to gather and have a joyous celebration! As an Espresso, this blend is a feel-good with its orange, sparkling notes blending with roasty-sweet chocolate. Being crafted by several origins meant to bring out the festive Lunar New Year of citrus, sweet fruits & chocolate. A versatile blend for handing out Americanos or Espresso-Milk based beverages! title: JURA W8
description: JURA W8 is a premium automatic coffee machine, perfect for small to medium-sized offices and businesses. With Swiss precision and sleek design, it delivers professional-grade coffee every time. Key features include a high-performance ceramic disc grinder, Pulse Extraction Process (P.E.P.®) for richer flavor, and fine foam technology for flawless milk drinks. The professional machine offers many benefits for operators including automatic milk system cleaning, a lockable bean container and water tank, adjustable programme functions and the ability to connect to a range of payment systems. The 2.8” color touchscreen offers simple, intuitive control, while easy-to-clean components ensure hassle-free maintenance. Capable of serving up to 50 cups daily, the W8 combines reliability, efficiency, and high-quality coffee, making it the perfect solution for professional environments. Interface Data Easy to connect payment solutions with a dongle called payment connect. The software is called Jura

title: WMF 1500S Automatic Coffee Machine
description: WMF 1500 S+ combines reliable performance with intuitive operation in a compact design. Tailor it to meet your needs and delight your customers with premium coffee specialties. Built for high quality and long-term reliability, it offers the flexibility to serve a variety of drinks efficiently in both served and self-service settings. Featuring pioneering digital connectivity, the WMF 1500 S+ is the perfect solution for growing and evolving your coffee business for years to come. Please do not check out this machine and check with us before purchase for availability. There are transaction fees we cannot refund. Key Features User-friendly 10 inches touch color display for simple operation Dual Coffee Grinders ensure precise and consistent grinding for a variety of coffee recipes. Business as usual - Each coffee hopper has it's own grinder so if one is malfunctioning, the other still works. Dynamic Milk Systems ensure constant high quality of milk based drinks by utilizing advanced sensor

title: JURA Cool Control
description: Introducing the JURA Cool Control—your ultimate coffee companion for enjoying trendsetting beverages like latte macchiato, flat white, and cappuccino. With its generous capacity and integrated locking mechanism, this milk cooler is built for the demands of professional environments. It keeps milk at the ideal 4°C, ensuring perfect freshness and hygiene for every recipe. Its sleek, minimalist design, combined with premium stainless steel and durable materials, makes the Cool Control the perfect match for any JURA automatic coffee machine, delivering both style and convenience. title: WMF Grounds Seperator
description: The WMF Grounds Separator is designed for quality brewing WMF coffee machines. It efficiently separates coffee grounds from the rinsing water before it flows into the drainage system. The grounds are collected in a dedicated container, simplifying disposal. A sensor detects when the separator is full and triggers an alert on the machine’s display, notifying the user with the message: " Grounds Separator Full." Technical Data Size (WxHxD): 31.4x 60.5x 42.7 cm Weight: ~12kg Container Capacity: 12L Powder: 230V, less than 10W Please note that this item will be delivered within approximately one week. title: 12L Milk Cooler Fridge with Compressor
description: This milk fridge is compatible with all coffee machines with a long milk tube . Your milk tube should be able to reach the bottom of your milk carton when it is inserted into the milk fridge. Compatible with DrCoffee, Schaerer, Franke, Kalerm, Jura, Eversys, Caye and many other brands We do not sell the milk tube that connects to the coffee machine, it should already come with your coffee machine. Capacity: 12L Temperature: 2-6'C Voltage: 110-220V / 50-60Hz / 70W Touchable LED Fridge Size (WxDxH): 25x45x43 cm Inner Size: 18.5x21x33 cm Wooden box packaging size:36x57x57cm Weight: 22 kg Certification: CE/Rosh Hole Opening: Two sides (right and left) Able to fit 8x1L UHT milk and 2x2L Meiji Milk (Depending on size of milk carton). Recommended to fit only 6x1L Uht Milk maximum so the airflow of the cool air is good. Comes with optional 5L Milk Container Dimension: 18 x 18 x 24.7cm LWH Double Hole (Small & Large): Use either of them to connect the milk tube into the milk. Highly recommended

title: ZF83 Stepless Espresso Coffee Grinder (Black)
description: If you would like to view the machine in person, book an appointment here with us . :) Features: 1. Pricing Value for money as a high volume commercial grinder. 2. ZF54W Scale Technology Trade-secret ZF scale technology. Ability to grind by weight (by plugging in scale) and grind by time (by plugging out scale) 3. Touch Screen Display Enable user friendly navigation and monitoring 4. Built-in Temperature Sensor Probe Ability to measure temperature inside of the grinder, to prompt user to stop grinding above 40 °C, in order to retain coffee aromas. 5. Built-in Humidity Sensor Probe Ability to measure humidity and temperature throughout the day, useful for baristas to understand espresso flow rate and calibrate recipe accordingly. 6. Built-in Cooling Fan Ability to cool down the internal temperature of the grinder, provide lower heat, in order to bulk grind and retain coffee aromas. 7. Programmability Ability to program a single / double dose by weight / time. Manual dosing for purging i

title: WMF ESPRESSO - HAND MADE AUTOMATICALLY
description: WMF Espresso brings the effortless automatic coffee with the traditional portafilter brewing visual. The machine itself will do automatic tamping with 100% consistency, include two grinders and two air-cooled hoppers for different beans, and it can even detect the portafilters type that is attached and can automatically suggest the suitable coffee types. Both manual and automatic milk form can perform with a single click. WMF Espresso - Hand Made Automatically gives you the sense of being automatic, convenient, modern and being traditional and classic at the same time. Please do not check out this machine and check with us before purchase for availability. Coffee Connect(Built in) : Smart connect to the innovative WMF digital platform to enhance smart control over the machine. Up to 60 cups per hour (300 cups per day), ideal for volumetric cafe or business. title: (57mm) Lelit Portafilter Basket (Single/Double/Triple/Blind/Pressurised)
description: Can be used on Bottomless/Naked Portafilter or Spouted portafilter. Select from: Single Double Triple Blind Pressurized Lelit Blind Filter (57mm) is used for machine maintenance by using pressurized hot water to flush the grouphead and prevent coffee stains containing acid and organic oil from corroding the gaskets over time if left untreated. The blind filter seals the portafilter, preventing hot water from escaping and the pressure formed in the grouphead will clean it. Recommended to clean at least twice a week for coffee addicts, with grouphead detergent like the Puly Caff Detergent Instructions: 1. Place Lelit blind filter basket in your portafilter holder. 2. Place grouphead detergent in the blind filter. (Optional, suggested once a week) 3. Load the portafilter with Lelit blind filter and secure into the group. 4. Let the machine run for about 5 seconds. Watch the pressure rise. 5. Stop the machine to depressurize the group, cleaning solution or water will be released into the d

title: Basic Filter Pourover Coffee Classes
description: How to sign up? Click through the calendar and find a slot! If you're unable to find a suitable date to attend, drop us a whatsapp and we'll try to fit you in Monday-Friday 9-6pm or the weekend. Cheers! Course Objective On completion of this course, the participant will gain an appreciation of production and processing cycle of Specialty Coffee from bean to cup and it’s impact on coffee flavour notes, understanding and application of different factors of coffee extraction in relation to filter coffee to tweak it to your preference Learning Outcomes Basic Coffee Production & Processing Coffee Roast Levels Brew Parameters for Filter Coffee Brew using the V60 Pourover Coffee If participants are advanced and time allows, brew using alternative pourover methods like the Clever Cup Course Methodology Understanding coffee origin, roasting and impact on taste Application of adjusting Brewing Parameters to change and calibrate the taste of your coffee according to your personal preference s Cho

title: Coconut Island Barista Coconut Milk
description: Crafted for the Perfect Cup We’re all about creating the ultimate coconut barista milk for every type of coffee drinker — especially those who want their plant milk to do more than just sit in the cup: Creamy, luxurious, and rich mouthfeel An uber delicious, lingering coconut aftertaste GETCOCONUTISLAND.COM Coconut Island Barista Milk We’re all about that taste. Created for coffee lovers and plant-based enthusiasts who crave the perfect cup, Coconut Island Barista Milk is all about delivering luxurious creaminess, rich coconut flavour, and a smooth, lingering aftertaste. Formulated using a premium blend of fresh coconut cream and concentrated coconut water, this recipe was carefully re-tested and refined over 12 months to create the ideal balance of flavour, texture, and performance. Why You’ll Love It TRANS FAT FREE GLUTEN FREE HALAL CERTIFIED CHOLESTEROL & PRESERVATIVE FREE NO GMO INGREDIENTS NO ARTIFICIAL COLOURING OR FLAVOURING FOAMABLE & BARISTA APPROVED SINGAPORE RECIPE & FORMULA

title: Mexico Women Power Zongolica
description: This coffee will be mailed out 30 July (Wed) onwards for all orders placed before 30 July Region: Zongolica, Veracruz Variety: Typica, Bourbon, Caturra Elevation: 1,250m – 1,700m ASL Processing: Semi-Washed, Sundried Roast profile: Medium Flavour notes: Stonefruits. Almonds. Floral Honey. White Tea. Acidity: Bright, crisp Body: Medium. Tea-like. Tasting experience This cup is a gentle journey. It opens with soft stonefruit brightness, like apricots and nectarines, before revealing creamy almond undertones and a lingering sweetness of floral honey. The finish is delicate and nuanced, light white tea and wildflowers, leaving a serene and comforting impression. Farm Information Women Power Zongolica (or WPZ) is a cooperative of 20-women strong whom grew and produced this particular lot in the Zongolica region of Veracruz, Mexico. This region's language, botanical techniques and the wisdom in which they interact with the environment is deeply influenced by the rich ancestral heritage of a

title: Fixed Latte Art Lessons
description: This Class is for Latte Art Classes with pre-determined dates for an entire month. They are held on Saturdays 10-11.30am, and you can choose which month you would like to attend in the variants below. This is the order the class will be taught in: Heart Tulip Rosetta Swan T&Cs: As this is a discounted group class made possible by a fixed schedule, there is strictly no exchange or refund in money or credit for any classes missed due to any reason, whether you are ill or there is an unfortunate incident. We are very sorry about this. Please be on-time for the class. We recommend that you come 15-30 mins early if you have not visited our location before to familiarise yourself with the area. The classes are held at 21 Lorong Kilat #01-07 and our chefs make their own bread in house from scratch and we also have some pasta mains. If you would like to expend some calories between the foodie hangouts, the rifle range nature park hike to the top of a quarry rewards you with a lovely green view

title: DC63 Conical Burr Coffee Grinder (Black)
description: Do not use credit card to purchase the paynow/bank transfer price. Transaction fees are non-refundable and will be charged to your order. DF64 launches new DC63 Single Dose Coffee Grinder – 63mm Conical Burrs for precise grinding. Featuring a stepless grind adjustment system , offers exceptional versatility across all brew methods - from espresso and pour-over to even Turkish coffee. Its innovative bellow hopper system ensures near-zero retention. Its sleek durable aluminum alloy body and finished with refined wood-accented accessories makes it a stunning centerpiece in any coffee setup. Key Features 63mm Conical Burrs - Precision grinding with consistent particle size and low heat transfer. Stepless Adjustment - Effortlessly dial in the perfect grind — from espresso to pour-over and beyond. title: Mexico Women Power Zongolica
description: This coffee will be mailed out 30 July (Wed) onwards for all orders placed before 30 July Region: Zongolica, Veracruz Variety: Typica, Bourbon, Caturra Elevation: 1,250m – 1,700m ASL Processing: Semi-Washed, Sundried Roast profile: Medium Flavour notes: Stonefruits. Almonds. Floral Honey. White Tea. Acidity: Bright, crisp Body: Medium. Tea-like. Tasting experience This cup is a gentle journey. It opens with soft stonefruit brightness, like apricots and nectarines, before revealing creamy almond undertones and a lingering sweetness of floral honey. The finish is delicate and nuanced, light white tea and wildflowers, leaving a serene and comforting impression. Farm Information Women Power Zongolica (or WPZ) is a cooperative of 20-women strong whom grew and produced this particular lot in the Zongolica region of Veracruz, Mexico. This region's language, botanical techniques and the wisdom in which they interact with the environment is deeply influenced by the rich ancestral heritage of a
weight: 10 Drip Bags (Select drip bags as grind size)

title: DC63 Conical Burr Coffee Grinder (Black)
description: Do not use credit card to purchase the paynow/bank transfer price. Transaction fees are non-refundable and will be charged to your order. DF64 launches new DC63 Single Dose Coffee Grinder – 63mm Conical Burrs for precise grinding. Featuring a stepless grind adjustment system , offers exceptional versatility across all brew methods - from espresso and pour-over to even Turkish coffee. Its innovative bellow hopper system ensures near-zero retention. Its sleek durable aluminum alloy body and finished with refined wood-accented accessories makes it a stunning centerpiece in any coffee setup. Key Features 63mm Conical Burrs - Precision grinding with consistent particle size and low heat transfer. Stepless Adjustment - Effortlessly dial in the perfect grind — from espresso to pour-over and beyond. description: ** Please let us know in the Order Notes which Machine / Grinder you want to see Maybe you need a brand new coffee setup including the coffee machine, grinder, coffee accessories for your home, office or cafe? If you did not cart out your order or did not receive the booking confirmation, please contact us first as most likely your booking did not go through! title: CF64V Coffee Grinder (Black) Flat Burr
description: Do not use credit card to purchase the paynow/bank transfer price. Transaction fees are non-refundable and will be charged to your order. CF64V flat burr grinder - a bold upgrade to your coffee ritual. Featuring a 64mm flat DLC vertical auger feed system and an integrated plasma generator , this next-gen grinder redefines demand performance, precision, and innovation. Upgrade your coffee journey with the CF64V - a futuristic vertical grinder built for coffee lovers who value performance and style. ( Precision / Innovation / Zero Static) Key Highlights Plasma Generator - neutralizes static for mess-free, clump-free grinding. 64mm DLC Burrs - smooth, consistent grind flow with excellent particle uniformity. Stepless Grind Adjustment - perfect for espresso, pour-over, French press, and more. Low Retention Design - keeps every dose fresh - no stale grounds left behind. description: Hey! We've officially moved our repair workshop to a bigger, better and more well equipped facility in order to serve you better! Here is our Technician Team's new base camp: Pantech Business Hub, 19 4 P andan Loop #06-08 Our Service Hotline number remains at 8550 8143! Please Whatsapp us if you have any questions! title: THE PHYSICS OF ESPRESSO - JONATHAN GAGNÉ
description: "If you are a coffee nerd, this book is a must-read!" The Physics of Espresso by Jonathan Gagné isn’t just another coffee book—it’s the go-to guide for anyone who wants to truly understand what’s happening in their cup. Think of it as the modern follow-up to Illy’s classic Espresso Coffee: The Science of Quality, but with way more practical tips you can actually use at home or behind the bar. Gagné breaks down the physics of espresso in a way that’s smart, clear, and surprisingly easy to follow. Drawing from published research, his own experiments, and the work of fellow coffee obsessives, he explains everything from extraction to technique—sprinkling in plenty of fresh ideas along the way. Chapter topics include: Water chemistry Espresso extraction Percolation science Grinding Puck prep Shot dynamics Pressure and flow profiling Coffee storage and freshness Also from Jonathan Gagne, the famous PHYSICS OF FILTER COFFEE

title: LOTUS COFFEE BREW WATER KIT
description: Want your coffee to actually taste like the coffee you paid for? It all starts with the water. Lotus Water lets you tweak your brew water so your coffee’s best flavours shine - just by adjusting the mineral content Each kit comes with four ready-to-use mineral blends. Pick a recipe from our online guide or play around with different water profiles to see how much a single coffee can change—there are flavours hiding in there you haven’t met. Take charge of how your coffee tastes with Lotus Water

title: HUSKEE Cup Customisation (Corporate Gifting, Brand Collaborations)
description: Screen Printing and Laser Engraving Available Screen Printing: Multiple Colours Available Laser Engraving: One Colour only (Reveals the colour underneath the coating: Silver or Black) MOQ for free customisation is 1008 Cups, with 3 months lead time. For smaller quantities or if you need faster lead times, let us know: 1) Printing Accessory: Metal with ceramic Lining or Natural Lid or RENEW Silicon Holder 2) Logo design (1 colour vs more colours) 3) Type of customisation: silk screen printing / laser etching Please email us at care@cowpressocoffee.sg for more information.

title: Cowpresso Cold Brew White (Coconut Milk)
description: Lovingly brewed for 16 hours, thickened with the Cowpresso EXCLUSIVE Coconut Island Barista Blend Coconut Milk! Please shake before drinking! Ingredients Cowpresso Coffee Beans, Coconut Island Barista Coconut Milk, Water, Sugar No Added Preservatives | Vegan-friendly | Dairy-free | No Alcohol Storage As milk is added, we recommend you finish each drink within 2 days upon receiving for optimum freshness. Delivery within Singapore We require 2-3 days to freshly prepare your Cold Brew White, and will arrange to send it out when it is ready! Sentosa, Changi & Tuas addresses will incur a surcharge!
